GSP33nysu__1u:8: yena prādurabhāvi bhūmivalaye vyastāri gosantatiḥ prābodhi śrutipaṅkajaṃ karuṇayā prākāśi tattvaṃ param /
GSP33nysu__1u:9: dhvāntaṃ dhvaṃsamanāyi sādhunikaraścākāri sanmārgagastena vyāsadivākareṇa satataṃ mā tyāji me mānasam // 2 //
GSP33nysu__1u:11: vyāptiryasya nije nijena mahasā pakṣe sapakṣe sthitirvyāvṛttiśca vipakṣato 'tha viṣaye saktinar vai bādhite /
GSP33nysu__1u:12: naivāsti pratipakṣayuktiratulaṃ śuddhaṃ pramāṇaṃ sa me bhūyāttattvavinirṇayāya bhagavānānandatīrtho muniḥ // 3 //
GSP33nysu__1u:14: bhavati yadanubhavādeḍamūko 'pi vāgmī jaḍamatirapi janturjāyate prājñamauliḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:15: sakalavacanaceto devatā bhāratī sā mama vacasi nidhattāṃ sannidhiṃ mānase ca // 4 //
GSP33nysu__1u:25: na śabdābdhau gāḍhā naca nigamacarcāsu caturā naca nyāye prauḍhā naca viditavedyā api vayam /
GSP33nysu__1u:26: paraṃ śrīmatpūrṇapramatigurukāruṇyasaraṇiṃ prapannā mānyāḥ smaḥ kimapi ca vadanto 'pi mahatām // 8 //
GSP33nysu__1u:28_4: karaṇīyaṃ śiṣyān grāhayituṃ granthādau nibadhnāti- nārāyaṇamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:31: asyodbhavādidamaśeṣaviśeṣato 'pi vandyaṃ sadā priyatamaṃ mama sannamāmi // MAnuv_1,1.1 //
GSP33nysu__1u:37: nikhiletyādīnāṃ tu pramāṇakarmaṇā nārāyaṇena viśeṣaṇatayā sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:44: tathātve 'pi kṛto 'nyāsu devatāsu satīṣu tasyaiva namanamityatroktamaśeṣaviśeṣato 'pi vandyamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:45: viśiṣṭate vastvebhiriti viśeṣā asādhāraṇadharmā aśeṣāśca te viśeṣāśca /
GSP33nysu__1u:47: yāvanto vandyatvanimittabhūtā dharmāḥ tebhyo viśeṣebhyo 'pi hetubhyo vandyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:60: nikhilā niḥśeṣāḥ pūrṇāḥ pratyekamapyanavadhikā guṇā ānandādayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:62: ta eva deho yasya na punaḥ prākṛtādiriti tathoktaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:64: asya pratyakṣādipramāṇasiddhatayā buddhisannihitasya svavyatiriktaprapañcasyodbhava utpattirādirasyetyudbhavādi janmādyaṣṭakaṃ tadyathāsambhavaṃ dadātītyudbhavādidastam /
GSP33nysu__1u:71: apauruṣeyatvena tanmūlatvena vānāśaṅkitadoṣatvādinā śobhanāni vākyāni vedādīni brahmasūtrādīni ca suvākyāni tairakhilairāpyatamam /
GSP33nysu__1u:73: yadi vyācikhyāsitena brahmamīmāṃsāśāstreṇa tannirṇetavyārthena vedādinā ca pratipādya iti nārāyaṇo vandanīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:74: hanta tarhi tata eva dharmādikaṃ prāṇādikaṃ vā vandanīyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:85: na cāntareṇa lakṣaṇaṃ vastunirdhāraṇamityato vibhavādanekāni nārāyaṇasya lakṣaṇānyanenocyante /
GSP33nysu__1u:86: tatra nikhiletyanena nikhilaguṇatvaṃ pūrṇaguṇatvaṃ svato guṇaikadehatvaṃ ceti vipakṣābhedena trīṇi lakṣaṇānyuditāni /
GSP33nysu__1u:96: nikhiletyādyuktalakṣaṇopapannatayā nārāyaṇaḥ kena pramāṇena pratipattavya ityataḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:115: athavā nāyaṃ nārāyaṇaśabdo ḍitthādiśabda iva bhagavati sāṅgetiko ghaṭādiśabda iva vā rūḍhimātrapravṛttaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:127: tṛtīyasūtreṇa tatra śāstraṃ pramāṇamabhidhāya tasyādhyāyaśeṣeṇa tadviṣayatopapāditā /
GSP33nysu__1u:134: viśeṣato me paramākhyavidyāvyākhyāṃ karomyanvapi cāhameva // MAnuv_1,1.2 //
GSP33nysu__1u:138: anvapi punarapi praṇamya bhaktayādyupetatālakṣaṇena prakarṣeṇa natvāhaṃ paramākhyavidyāyā brahmamīmāṃsāśāstrarūpāyā vyākhyāṃ karomīti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:144: bhāve vā pūrvaśloka eva bahuśaḥ sannamāmīti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:151: yo hi yacchāstre pravartate tasya tatprabhāvo gururiti prasiddhameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:153: jagata etacchāstrapravaktṛṇāṃ brahmādīnāmañjasā mukhyatayā na tu vayo 'dhikatvādimātreṇa gurum /
GSP33nysu__1u:155: prakārāntareṇa gurutvaṃ nārāyaṇasya samarthayate- viśeṣata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:157: viśeṣata iti sākṣādupadeṣyṛtvena na tu jagata iva paramparayā /
GSP33nysu__1u:158: atra yadi śāstraprabhavamityādyevocyeta tadā pṛthakpraṇāmena devatāyā gurośca pārthakyaśaṅkā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:182: tadbhāve 'pi tathāvidhavākyāntaraparityāgenāsyaiva vyākhyāne kāraṇaṃ vaktavyamityāśaṅkānirāsāya paramākhyavidyetyuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:185: asti tāvadasmingranthe“dve vidye veditavye parā caivāparā ca'; ityādau paravidyākhyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:195: tathāpi svapraṇītabhāṣyeṇaiva kṛtavyutpādanamidaṃ śāstramiti kimanena vyutpādanenetyato 'nvapi cetyāha /
GSP33nysu__1u:206: yaduktaṃ nārāyaṇo 'sya śāstrasya prabhava iti tadayuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:212: paraśabdasyānekārthatvena vidyāśabdasya cārthavivakṣāvirahiṇyapi mantre prayogadarśanena paravidyākhyāyāḥ sarvottamaprāmāṇyāniścāyakatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:213: kiñceyaṃ paravidyākhyaitadviṣayetyatrāpi na niyāmakamastītyata āha- prādurbhūta iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:214_1: prādurbhūto na tu jāto granthamimaṃ cakra ityanena nārāyaṇasya śāstraprabhavatve
GSP33nysu__1u:215: dṛśyante hi kevalaṃ kṛpāpāravaśyena paropakārāya pravartamānāḥ sutarāṃ tairarthitāḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:216: ata eva paraprayojanamapyātmagāmīva manyamānasya bhagavataḥ śāstrapraṇayanamiti jñāpayitumātmanepadaprayogaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:218: paravidyākhyayā asya sarvottamaprāmāṇyasiddhiṃ vyutpādayituṃ paravidyākhyamityanūdyānuttamaṃ śāstramiti vyākhyātam /
GSP33nysu__1u:224: iti vidyādvayamuddiśya tatrāparetyādinā sāṅgānvedānaparavidyātvenoktavā“atha parā yayā tadakṣaramadhigamyate';
GSP33nysu__1u:232: tadyathā paramadhārmika ityabhihite paramatvaṃ dharmeṇeti jñāyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:248: tā eva paramā vidyā yadā viṣṇostu vācakāḥ'; iti bhagavatpādīyaṃ vyākhyānamapyetamevārthaṃ sūcayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:249: brahmamīmāṃsāśāstravyutpāditanyāyānupakṛtā hi vedādayo viṣṇoravācakāstadukṛtāśca tasya vācakā bhavantīti /
GSP33nysu__1u:250: tathāpi kevalasya na paravidyātvaṃ labhyata iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:258: evaṃ tāvadāgamenāsya śāstrasyānuttamaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ prasādhyādhunānumānato 'pi tat siṣādhayiṣurādau tāvatprāmāṇyamātre anumānaṃ vaktumāha- gururiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:259: yato yatkāraṇaṃ bādarāyaṇo gurūṇāṃ jagatastattvopadeśakānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ gururupadeṣyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:260_0: yataśca śāstrāṇāṃ vedānāṃ bhāratādīnāṃ ca yathāsambhavaṃ prabhavo gurūṇāmaśeṣārthapratipādakānāṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:260_1: savistarāṇāṃ vedādiśāstrāṇāṃ gururmukhyaprabhavo na tu sampradāyamātrapravartaka iti vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:262: taduditaṃ tena bādarāyaṇenopadiṣyamidaṃ śāstramato mānaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33nysu__1u:265: atra gururgurūṇāmityādihetūnāṃ vaktṛśrotṛprasaṅgānāmānukūlyānyeva sākṣātsādhyāni mānasīti tu paramasādhyanirdeśa iti jñātavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:267: vivakṣitārthatattvajñānaṃ karaṇapāṭavaṃ vivakṣā ceti trayaṃ vakturānukūlyaṃ nāma /
GSP33nysu__1u:270: tatra gurūṇāṃ gururiti vakturbādarāyaṇasya vivakṣitārthatattvajñānasādhane hetuḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:271: yo hi yasya tattvopadeṣyā sa tato 'dhikatattvajñānavānupalabdhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:272: ayaṃ ca sarvajñakalpānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ tattvopadeṣyā brahmarudrādideveṣvityādyāgamādavagataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:274: gurūṇāṃ śāstrāṇāṃ guruḥ prabhava ityanenāpi tattvajñānaṃ karaṇapāṭavaṃ ca sādhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:275: yo hi yāvadatharpratipādakasyāgamasya prabhavaḥ sa tāvantamarthaṃ tattvato jānannavagataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:278: yaśca bahorāgamasya prabhavaḥ so 'sati nimittāntare paṭukaraṇo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:279: ayaṃ cāparasya vedādeḥ prabhavaḥ kathamapaṭukaraṇo bhavediti /
GSP33nysu__1u:282: nahi svayaṃ tattvajñānāyogyaḥ pareṣāṃ tattvopadeṣyā dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:289: nanvatra gururgurūṇāmityādīnāṃ śāstraprāmāṇyena yathāśruta eva sādhyasādhanabhāvo vyākhyāyatām /
GSP33nysu__1u:295: yadyapi caite pratyekaṃ bauddhāgamādau mānatāṃ vyabhicaranti /
GSP33nysu__1u:301: teṣāmapraṇītatvādbādarāyaṇena brahmādīnprati tanmokṣārtamupadiṣṭatvamātraṃ hetuḥ syāditi cedbāḍham /
GSP33nysu__1u:303: tathā sati gururgurūṇāṃ prabhavaḥ śāstrāṇāmiti vyarthamāpadyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:324: naca pratyakṣādau satyapi prāmāṇye nāstyāptavākyatvamiti sādhyāvyāpakatvānnāyamupādhiriti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:328: saṃmatatve vā sādhanāvacchinne pauruṣeyavākyatvāvacchinne vā sādhye 'syopādhitvopapatteriti /
GSP33nysu__1u:333: api tarhyanukūlavaktrādimattvasyāptavākyatayā vyāptatvāttena tāṃ prasādhya tayā prāmāṇyaṃ śāstrasya sādhyata ityāśayavānāha- vaktṛśrotṛprasaktīnāmiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:337: tena siddhayā'ptavākyatayā mānamidaṃ śāstramiti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:349: pramāṇadṛṣṭeti viśeṣaṇe 'pi pramāṇadṛṣṭasya pramādādinānyathākathake api prasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:350: pramāṇena yathā dṛṣṭaṃ tathā vādīti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:370: evaṃ sati yo yatraivambhūtaḥ sa tatrāpta ityuktaṃ syāditi cedastu ko doṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:374: yo yasya sutaḥ sa tadīyaṃ dhanaṃ arhatītyādau sārvatrikavyavahārahetutopalambhāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:377: yathā cānanugatasyāpi nāvyāptiḥ sārvatrikavyavahārahetutā ca tathā sāmānyaparīkṣāyāṃ vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:380: etena nirdoṣaḥ pramitasyaiva vakteti lakṣaṇadvayamapi samāhitaṃ veditavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:383: vipralipsā ca śrotṛprasaṅgānukūlataikanibandhanā tadabhāve nivartata iti vaktrādyānukūlyavattāyā āptavākyatayā susthaḥ pratibandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:385: nahi nāṭakādiprabandhaṃ viracayannapi kadāciduktalakṣaṇopapanno na bhavati bhavabhūtiriti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:398: anukūlavaktrādimattayā āptavākyatāsādhane vaktrānukūlyasyāptyekadeśatvena sādhyāviśiṣṭatā ca syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:399: vaktṛśrotṛprasaktīnāmiti vākyaṃ tu śaṅkitasya upādheḥ sādhanavyāpakatāpradarśanārthaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33nysu__1u:403: nahi upādhiṃ dūṣayatā sādhanavyāpakatāṃ vyutpādya sādhanenopādheḥ pakṣe sādhanaṃ vidhāya tena sādhyaṃ sādhanīyamiti kuladharmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:405: upādheḥ sādhanābhedaṃ pradarśya tena sādhyaṃ sādhyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:413: anyathā yo dhūmavānasāvagnimāniti vyāpyavyāpakabhāvo 'pi na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:416: yadā tu nirdoṣaḥ pramitasyaiva vaktā āpta ityāśritaṃ tadā sādhyaviśiṣṭatāyāḥ śaṅkaiva nāsti /
GSP33nysu__1u:421: anyathāstu vaktrādyānukūlyaṃ vakturvipralipsāmūlatvenāprāmāṇyaṃ ca bhavatvityāśaṅkāyāḥ ko nivārayitā /
GSP33nysu__1u:422: yadyapi prāmāṇyaṃ svata eveti bādarāyaṇīyaṃ matam /
GSP33nysu__1u:428: evaṃ vijātīyasaṃvādenāsya śāstrasya prāmāṇyamupapādya tadanuttamatāsiddhaye sajātīyadvayasaṃvādamapyāha- śrutīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:431: yathā āptavākyatayā tathā śrutimūlatayāpītyupamārtho vā tathāśabdaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:433: tathāpyatra sāmānārthatāsāmyena gaupyā vṛttyā śrutiyuktisaṃvāditārthau vyākhyeyau /
GSP33nysu__1u:460: brahma vedastadarthaḥ parabrahma vā tasya sūtrāṇi brahmasūtrāṇi /
GSP33nysu__1u:461: sakalavedārthabhūtasya parabrahmaṇo viṣṇoḥ svarūpanirṇayārthāni sūtrāṇīti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__1u:463: etenaitacchāstravācinaḥ śārīrakaśabdasya śarīrameva śarīrakaṃ tatra bhavaḥ śārīrako jīvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:464: tamadhikṛtya kṛto 'yaṃ granthaḥ śārīraka iti vyākhyānaṃ nirastaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:466: tvaṃpadābhidheyasya tatpadābhidheyabrahmarūpatā mīmāṃseti vyākhyānādavirodha iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:478: yata evaṃ brahmasūtrāṇāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ trividhaṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:481: āptavākyatrayādiliṅgatrayāvasitaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ anyatrāpi cetsyāttadā kathameṣāṃ tadanuttamamityato brahmasūtrāṇāmevetyuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:502: tacca yāvadyāvadadhikaṃ pramīyate tattadanusāriṇīmaviśaṅkāṃ kṣiprapravṛttiṃ prasūta ityanubhavasiddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:508: svayaṃ kṛtāpi tadvayākhyā kriyate spaṣṭatārthataḥ // MAnuv_1,1.7 //
GSP33nysu__1u:510: tadevaṃ śrutyanumānābhyāmidameva śāstraṃ pramāṇatamaṃ nānyadetādṛśamastītyupasaṃharati- ata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:516: nanu cāsya śāstrasyārambhaṇīyatvaṃ sūtrakāra eva prathamasūtre samarthayate /
GSP33nysu__1u:530: tathāpi nedaṃ vyākhyātavyaṃ vyākhyātatvādityatrānvapi ceti yat prayojanāntaraṃ astīti sūcitaṃ tadvivaraṇārthamāha- svayamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:531: yadyapi teṣāṃ brahmasūtrāṇāṃ vyākhyā svayaṃ mayaiva bhāṣye kṛtā tathāpi punaratra spaṣṭataivārthaḥ prayojanaṃ yasya spaṣṭatārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:543: yataḥ saṅkṣepavistarābhyāmuktaṃ śrotṛṇāṃ sugrahaṃ saprayojanaṃ ca bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:553: śāstraprabhavaṃ ityādibhirbahubhiḥ prakārairyadgurutvopapādanaṃ tena gurūṃśceti bahuvacanāntaṃ padaṃ vivṛtam /
GSP33nysu__1u:557: nirupapadasūtragrahaṇena yadbrahmasūtrāṇāṃ sarvottamaprāmāṇyaṃ sūcitaṃ tadupapādanaṃ paramākhyeti /
GSP33nysu__1u:561: yasmādāptimūlatvādiyuktayāpi brahmasūtrāṇāṃ sarvottamaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ samarthayituṃ etaditi darśayati gururgurūṇāmityādineti /
GSP33nysu__1u:565: maṅgalācaraṇapuraḥsarāṇi khalu karmāṇi nirantarāyaṃ parisamāpyante pracīyante ca /
GSP33nysu__1u:570: śrutiniścite tu sādhyasādhanabhāve tadabhāve 'pi bhāvo 'nekakāraṇakatvasya kalpako bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:573: nahi sāmagrīvaikalyena sādhyaṃ vyabhicaran heturahetuḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:575: nahi pratibaddhaṃ kāryaṃ ajanayat kāraṇamakāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:588: naca pratyakṣāderatrāvakāśa iti śrutireva śiṣyācāramūlaṃ kalpyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:591: naca bhagavataḥ sūtrakārasya vighnā eva na santīti tatparihārārthānanuṣṭhānaṃ na doṣāyeti yuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:593: yato maṅgalācaraṇapuraḥsarāṇi śāstrāṇi vīryavanti bhavantyāyuṣmatpuruṣakāṇi ca /
GSP33nysu__1u:596: kiṃ nāma granthādau na niveśitamityapi nirastam /
GSP33nysu__1u:619: anyathādhikāriviṣayavaidhuryeṇa śāstrasya anārambhaṇīyatvaśaṅkā na nirākṛtā syādityanarthakaṃ sūtramāpadyetetyata āha- tatreti //
GSP33nysu__1u:625: tatra prathamasūtre 'vayavatayā sarvaśāstrasya cāṅgatayā ceṣyate 'ṅgīkriyate sūtrakṛteti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:630: yatparyāyāntaraṃ vihāyānayoreva kramāntaraṃ vihāyādāvevopādānaṃ tena jānīmo jñāpakatayā'disūtrasya kārakatayā samastaśāstrasya copayogitvenaitau sūtrakṛtā vivakṣitāviti /
GSP33nysu__1u:637: atra yatpareṣāṃ dūṣaṇaṃ“maṅgalasya vākyārthe samanvayābhāvāt'; iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:640: sa ca vācyo vā lakṣyo vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:641: na ceha maṅgalamathaśabdasya vācyaṃ lakṣyaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:643: naca kāryajñāpyayorvākyārthe samanvayaḥ śābde vyavahāre dṛṣṭaḥ'; /
GSP33nysu__1u:665: evaṃcāyamoṅkāraḥ sūtrakṛtā maṅgalārthatayā sūtrādāvupanibaddha ityanupapannamityata āha- sarvatra iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:666: akhilaiḥ sūtrapāṭhakaiḥ yatpṛthagasaṃhitatayoṅkriyate tatsarvatra sūtreṣvanugatatvenābhilaṣitena nimittenopapadyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:672: iti śrautārthavādasāmarthyātsarvāsvapi brahmavidyāsvādyantayoroṅkārasyohaḥ kartavya iti gamyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:676: tasya saṃhitatayā nirdeśe prathamasūtrāvayava evāyaṃ vijñāyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:678: naca vyākhyānato 'pyadhikāro jñāyata iti vyarthaṃ pṛthakkaraṇamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:680: tadanenāsaṃhitatayā nirdeśe nimittāntaraṃ vadatā hetoranyathāsiddhiruktā bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:682: nanu ca śrautārthavādabalenādyantayoroṅkārasyoho vā prāṅmukhatvādivadbahirbhūtasyaiva uccāraṇaṃ vā vidheyatvena kalpyamiti sandihyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:685: vakṣyamāṇanyāyenoṅkārārthasya prathamasūtravākyārthe samanvayena niścayopapattau bādhitaviṣayaṃ cānumānamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:688_1: labdhena sarvatrānugatatvena kāraṇenaivopapadyata ityanena dṛṣṭānte sādhakasya hetoranyathāsiddhiruktā /
GSP33nysu__1u:691_1: ca prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛtterārambhaṇīyatāsiddhaye prekṣāvataḥ pravartayituṃ prayojanādyabhisambandhaṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:694: nanu brahmajñānasya mokṣahetutā yadi śāstrapravṛtteḥ prāgeva pramāṇāntarasiddhā vyarthaṃ tadā tadabhidhānaṃ śāstre /
GSP33nysu__1u:696: athehaiva tanniścayastadā pravṛttau prayojanādiniścayo niścite ca prayojanādau pravṛttirityanyonyāśrayatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:701: evameva tatra pravṛttāvuttaratrāpi tathātvaprasaṅgādanarthakaṃ sūtre prayojanādyabhidhānamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:710: naca mumukṣuṇā anapekṣite svarge yāgādikaṃ tatsādhanatayā nānubhūyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:711: puruṣātharsādhane tu icchālakṣaṇā prayatnalakṣaṇā vā pravṛttistathā na svarasasiddhā /
GSP33nysu__1u:713: tasmādyo yatra pravartanīyaḥ sa tatprayojanādikaṃ darśayitvaiva iti sārthakaṃ sūtre prayojanādyabhidhānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:716: uktaṃ ca prayojanādikaṃ śrotā kataṃ śraddadhītāśraddadhānaśca kathaṃ pravarteteti punaravaśiṣyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:719: yadyapi āptatvāvadhāraṇe prayojanādyanabhidhāne 'pi tatsāmānyaniścayo bhavatyeva prayojanādimadidaṃ śāstraṃ āptoktatvāditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:723: saca prayojanādiviśeṣo vacanādevāvasīyata iti sārthakaṃ tadabhidhānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:725: nanu sandehaḥ prayojanādyavacane 'pi sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāve sati sulabha eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:729: yo hi yadvacanātpravartate sa tadvacanādeva viśeṣasmṛtimapekṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:731: nahi rogārto mamedaṃ roganivṛttisādhanaṃ na veti yatra tatrocchṛṅkhalaḥ svayaṃ utprekṣya pravartate /
GSP33nysu__1u:745: yadi tāvadāptavākyatayā sūtramidaṃ prayojanāderniścāyakaṃ syāttadā'gamatayā nyāyasūtratvahāniḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:746: kiñcāptatvaṃ sūtrakṛto yena vedādinā pramāṇenāvagantavyaṃ tenaiva prayojanādyabhisambandho 'pi śāstrasyāvagamyata iti vyarthaṃ tadabhidhānamāpadyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:748: nahi kaścitprayojanādisandehe 'timahāyāsasādhye pravartate prāguktānarthaparamparāśca kathaṃ na śaṅketa /
GSP33nysu__1u:749: tasmānnedaṃ prayojanādyupadeśamātraṃ kintu śrautasya prayojanādeḥ nyeyenopapādanārthamityeva parihāraḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:750: āptatvaṃ tu nyāyasyopodbalakamātramiti bhāṣyakārīyaṃ tadvyutpādanamapi nānarthakam /
GSP33nysu__1u:771: yadīdaṃ śāstraṃ pareṇopalabhyeta tadoktasandehakāraṇopapattau prayojanārthitvena viśeṣasmṛtimataivaṃ sandihyeteti sūtrakṛta eva parakīyasambhāvitasaṃśayāharaṇopapatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:775: nahi vicāraḥ kartavyaḥ taddvārabhūtanyāyanibandhanaṃ ca nārambhaṇīyamiti sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:779: etacchāstravyutpādanīyanyāyakaraṇikāyāṃ jijñāsāyāṃ ubhayavidhavyāpāradarśanādviśeṣādarśanācca saṃśayaḥ kiṃ kartavyā na veti /
GSP33nysu__1u:780: nanu ca tadvijijñāsasva iti jijñāsāyāḥ śrutivihitatvāt kathaṃ viśeṣādarśanam /
GSP33nysu__1u:787: kṛṣṭādikaṃ hi sati viṣayabhūte bhūmyādau prayojane ca sasyādhigamādāvadhikāriṇi ca kṛṣīvalādau kartavyamupalabdham /
GSP33nysu__1u:788: sā ca vyāpikā vyāvartamāneto vyāpyāmapi kartavyatāṃ vyāvartayatīti pratibandhasiddhiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:789: viṣayaśūnyatvāddhi samanaskendriyasannikṛṣṭasya sphītālokamadhyavartino ghaṭasya na jijñāsā kriyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:791: sambandhavaidhuryāddhi saprayojanaṃ saviṣayamapi śabdajñānamarthayamāno na vaidyake pravartate /
GSP33nysu__1u:811: evaṃ tarhi tata eva na jijñāsyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:812: ata evānāditastadīyatattvajñāne vidyamāne 'pi iṣyāniṣyaprāptiparihārayoradarśanānnāsau jijñāsitaḥ kasyacitprayojanasyeṣye /
GSP33nysu__1u:815: nanvayaṃ kartā bhoktā doṣasaṃsargī cāhaṃpratyaye prakāśate /
GSP33nysu__1u:823: yatkvacicchāstre 'pi laukikapravedanīyārthavyutpādanamanuvādo 'sau na punaḥ sa eva pradhānavyāpāraḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:830: jīvasya cāhamiti svaprakāśatayā svaprakāśajñānāśrayatayā mānasapratyakṣavedyatayā vā siddhatvena na jijñāsāviṣayatvamityuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:852: svataḥ prāmāṇyāṅgīkāre tu vedaviruddhānāmapi śākyādivacasāṃ tathātvāpātena punarvedāpramāṇyatādavasthyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:858: prayojanaṃ ceśvarajijñāsayā abhyudayo vā syāt mokṣo vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:865: jijñāsā ca mokṣasādhanaṃ bhavantī kiṃ sākṣāduta jñānadvāreṇa /
GSP33nysu__1u:878: atha parāmārtha evāyaṃ bandhastarhi na jñānena nivarteta /
GSP33nysu__1u:884: śarīrādyabhāve ca tatsādhyasukhābhāvena kasyāpi tatrārthitānupapatteranadhikārikaṃ śāstramāpadyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:885: ko hi svasthātmā sahasā sukhatatsādhane hātumutsahate /
GSP33nysu__1u:888: śāstraṃ cedamanārambhaṇīyamiti prāpte sūtrayāmāsa bhagavānācāryaḥ- oṃ athāto brahmajijñāseti //
GSP33nysu__1u:897: atra yaduktaṃ jīvavyatirikta īśvara eva nāstīti tatparihārāya sūtrakṛtoṅkārabrahmaśabdau prayuktau /
GSP33nysu__1u:904: nahi padaṃ cakṣurādivadapratīta evārthe pratītiṃ janayati yenāpūrvamarthaṃ padaprayogādeva pratīmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:906: kintu sannihitānekavākyārthasāmarthyāllabhyata ityata āha bhāṣyakāraḥ- otatvavācīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:915_0: tathāca yadyasau karmāṇi tadā karturyadi vā kartari tadā karmaṇo 'pekṣāyāmupapadādyabhāve
GSP33nysu__1u:919: tathā ca pūrvavadyogyatayā “atha kasmāducyate brahmeti bṛhanto hyasmin guṇāḥ';
GSP33nysu__1u:937: yatpunarakāravācyena tatpadārthenokāravācyasya tvaṃpadārthasyābhedo makāreṇocyate brahmaśabdena ca sakalastvātmakatvalakṣaṇapūrṇatābhidhīyata iti vyākhyānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:969: na cālaukikārthakalpane gauravaprasaṅgādvaraṃ kathañcideṣāṃ śabdānāṃ jīvādiviṣayāṅgīkaraṇamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:976: tathāca śrautaṃ brahmādiśabdaṃ jīvādiviṣayamaṅgīkurvāṇenāpi niravagrahapūrṇatāyuktaṃ kiñcidabhidheyaṃ mukhyamaṅgīkaraṇīyameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:981: sa eva bhargaśabdārtho vyāhṛtīnāṃ ca bhūmataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:982: bhāvanāccaiva sutvācca so 'yaṃ puruṣa ityapi // MAnuv_1,1.10 //
GSP33nysu__1u:991: vedasyeśvaraviṣayatā kuta ityato 'pyoṅkāraḥ sūtrakṛtā brahmaṇi prayuktaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:996: ataḥ sa eva vyāhṛtīnāṃ ca bhūrādīnāmartha iti gamyate“praṇavārthā vyāhṛtayaḥ';
GSP33nysu__1u:1002: kena nimittena vyāhṛtīnāṃ ca sa evārtha ityata āha- bhūmata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:1017: kimato na hi vyāhṛtaya eva veda iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1020: nanu gāyatṛyāṃ yo bhargo no 'smākaṃ dhiyaḥ pracodayātprerayettasya saviturdevasya tadvareṇyaṃ rūpaṃ dhīmahi cintayāma iti bharganāmakaḥ savitā pratipādyo dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1021: tatkathaṃ bhagavatparatvamityata āha- sa eva bhargaśabdārtha iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:1032: nanu puruṣasūkte puruṣasya paśorhiraṇyagarbhasya vā pratipādanātkathaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ pratipādyata ityata āha- so 'yamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:1035: “sa vā ayaṃ puruṣaḥ sarvāsu pūrṣṛpuriṣayo nainena kiñcanānāvṛtaṃ nainena kiñcanāsaṃvṛtam'; iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1038: siddhe ca puruṣasūktārthatve viṣṇoḥ kiṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1041: sa eva sarvavedārtho jijñāsyo 'yaṃ vidhīyate // MAnuv_1,1.11ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:1044: “vedāḥ puruṣasūktagāḥ'; ityāgamena sarvavedānāṃ puruṣasūktārthatayāvagatatvādityāha- sa eveti //
GSP33nysu__1u:1047: ityādiśrutisiddhamapi bhagavataḥ sarvavedārthatvaṃ nyāyenopapādayitumayaṃ prayatnaḥ sūtrakārasya /
GSP33nysu__1u:1050: yo yadvayākhyeyārthaḥ sa tadartho yathā sampratipanna iti vā sarvo veda īśvaraparastatparoṅkāravyākhyānatvāditi vā sākṣādevānumānaṃ kiṃ na vyākhyāyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1051: “tadyathā sarvāṇi parṇāni śaṅkunā santṛṇṇānyevamoṅkāreṇaiva sarvā vāk santṛṇṇā';
GSP33nysu__1u:1054: tathāpi vākyāntarabalena na sarvā vāgoṅkāravyākhyānaṃ sākṣātkiṃ nāmoktaprakāreṇa paramparayaiveti jñāpayitumitthaṃ vyākhyānamityadoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1055: nanu ceśvare pramāṇaṃ pṛṣṭavata oṃkārabrahmaśabdāveva kasmānnoktau kiṃ vedānumānena /
GSP33nysu__1u:1064: ayamiti uktavidhayā jīvajaḍātmakātprapañcādatyantaviviktatvena niścitatayā viṣayabhūtaḥ sarvavedārthatayā śakyapratipādanaścetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1072: na hi bījasyāṅkuraṃ janayataḥ sahakāriṇo jalāderaṅkuro na kāryam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1080: tatra kartṛvyāpārasya karaṇavyāpāravyavadhānena vṛkṣakarmateva mīmāṃsāvyāpārasyāpi pramāṇādisambhāvanāddhāreṇeśvarāvabodha evoddeśya iti bhavati tatkarmatā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1097: tathāpi pratibandhanivṛttau satyāmeva nirṇaya iti pratibandhakanirāsahetorapi vicārasyopacāreṇa nirṇayahetutvādupapannamīśvaraviṣayatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1099: īśvarasya vedapramāṇakatve tata eva niścitatvātkiṃ mīmāṃsayeti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1103: apare tu tadaṅgīkṛtyāpi tadvācināṃ padānāṃ jīvādiviṣayatāṃ vyākurvantastadabhāvamasthitāḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1104: anye tu punarastīśvaraḥ kintu paramārthato nirguṇa eveti saṅgirante /
GSP33nysu__1u:1105: eke tu saguṇo 'pi na jagataḥ kāraṇamapi tūdāsīna evetyātiṣṭhante /
GSP33nysu__1u:1109: kecidvigrahavantamityevamādyāsvanekāsu vipratipattiṣu satīṣu tattvajñānakaraṇādapi vedāttadanutpattau tadapanodanadvāreṇa vedetikartavyatārūpā jijñāsā kartavyeti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1112: tatra tāvadbrahmaṇo jijñāsā brahmajijñāseti ṣaṣṭhīsamāso na punardharmāya jijñāsetivaccaturthīsamāsaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1113: tādarthyasamāse prakṛtigrahaṇaṃ kartavyamiti vārtikakṛtā prakṛtivikārabhāva eva caturthīsamāsasya niyamitatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1122: jijñāsā khalu karmāpekṣā vinā karmaṇā na jñātuṃ śakyā na tu sambandhinaṃ vineti karmaṇaḥ prādhānyāttadeva vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1125: evaṃ sati lakṣaṇādijijñāsāpi pratijñātā syāditi cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:1133: iti karmāṇi ṣaṣṭhayāḥ samāsaḥ pratiṣidhyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:1137: athavā brahmaṇaḥ karmatvenāprādhānyaśaṅkāṃ nivartayituṃ jijñāsya iti karmaprādhānyaṃ sūcitam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1153: apare tu kāryaniṣṭha eva vedabhāgo vicāryatvena tatra prakrānto vicāritaśca na vastutattvaniṣṭha ityato vastutattvaniṣṭhaṃ vedabhāgaṃ vicārayitumidamārabhyata ityāhuḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1156: dharmajijñāsāśāstraṃ tu vedaikadeśāmukhyārthadharmavicārāya pravṛttamityāśayena vā“sa eva bhargaśabdārthaḥ'; ityādyuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1157: tatra sarvavedārtha ityanena gatārthatāśaṅkānirāsaḥ sa eva na tu kāryaśeṣatayetyādyaṃ samādhānaṃ sarveti dvitīyaṃ ca nirastam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1162: jñānī priyatamo 'to me taṃ vidvāneva cāmṛtaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.11cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:1163: vṛṇute yaṃ tena labhya ityādyuktibalena hi /
GSP33nysu__1u:1167: brahmajijñāsāyā niṣprayojanatvaṃ śaṅkitamapākartuṃ ataḥśabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe- jñānīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:1172: vṛṇute yamityanena“yamevaiṣa vṛṇute'; iti vākyaṃ saṅgṛhītam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1173: ādipadena“ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ'; ityādeḥ saṅgrahaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1176: yasmāttasya brahmaṇo nārāyaṇasya prasādātparamānugrahādeva mucyate saṃsārāt na tu karmādineti“tamevam'“yamevaiṣa vṛṇute';
GSP33nysu__1u:1179: tathāpi yamevaiṣa vṛṇuta iti śrutibalena gamyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1181: tathāpi yamevaiṣa vṛṇuta iti vākyānurodhena tatrāpyanusandheyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1186: na punaḥ karmādineti jñānī priyatamastamevaṃ vidvānityuktibalenāvagamyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1189: īśvarajñānaṃ ca tajjijñāsayaiva nānyeneti“ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ';
GSP33nysu__1u:1190: iti paramātmadaśarnānuvādena tatsādhanatayā śrotavya ityādinā śravaṇādividhāyakoktibalena pratīyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1195: yadyapi na jijñāsāyāḥ svargādirūpo 'bhyudayaḥ prayojanaṃ sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:1206: siddhaṃ ca sādhanaṃ bhagavāniti mumukṣuṇā savyāpārīkaraṇīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1215: prasādo nāmecchāviśeṣo guṇāntaraṃ vā na naḥ kacit kṣatiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1217: yamadhikṛtya“yatra nānyatpaśyati'“sā niśā paśyato muneḥ'; ityādiśrutismṛtayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1220: nacāvyaktasvabhāvo bhagavāṃsahasreṇāpi prayatnānāṃ śakyaḥ sākṣātkartuṃ vinā tadanugrahāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1223: naca nididhyāsanaṃ vākyārthagrahaṇalakṣaṇe śravaṇe kṛte 'pi vinā mananāparanāmnā vicāreṇopapadyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1227: ye tu dhyānameva paramapāṭavāpannamaparokṣākāramiti manyante teṣāṃ darśanaśrutaya upacaritārthāḥ prasajyeran /
GSP33nysu__1u:1242: evaṃca vicāro yato jñānasādhanaṃ jñānaṃ ca mokṣasādhanamato asau kartavya iti labhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1245: īśvaraprasādasya tu jñāpakaṃ na kiñcidatra paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1250: ātmayāthātmyājñānādanātmani śarīrādāvātmatvārope sati hi tadanukūlapratikūlayo rāgadveṣau bhavataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1253: tasmācca duḥkhānubhava ityanādirayaṃ kāryakāraṇapravāhaḥ saṃsāra ityucyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1259: tayorabhāve ca na pravṛtterutpattiḥ prāgupacitāyāścopabhogena prrakṣayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1262: janmābhāve ca na nirbījasya duḥkhasyotpāda ityevamātyantikī duḥkhanivṛttirmuktiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1269: dravyaṃ karma ca kālaśca svabhāvo jīva eva ca /
GSP33nysu__1u:1270: yadanugrahataḥ santi na santi yadupekṣayā // MAnuv_1,1.13 //
GSP33nysu__1u:1271: narte tvat kriyate kiñcidityāderna hariṃ vinā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1272: jñānasvabhāvato 'pi syānmuktiḥ kasyāpi hi kvacit // MAnuv_1,1.14 //
GSP33nysu__1u:1284: “na ṛte tvatkriyate kiñcana'; iti śrutyā sarvārthakriyāyāstadadhīnatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1297: upapādayiṣyate hi jñānānandādisvarūpo 'yaṃ jīva iti puṃstvādivadityādinā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1305: ataḥ kāmakarmādyatiriktaṃ māyāvidyā prakṛtirityādiśabdābhidheyamanādyeva kimapi dravyamaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1314: ataḥ parameśvara eva sattvādiguṇamayyā vidyāvirodhitvenāvidyayā svādhīnayā prakṛtyācintyādbhutayā svaśaktayā ca jīvasya svaprakāśamapi svarūpacaitanyamācchādayatīti yuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1317: prasanna evāsau svakīyāṃ māyāṃ vyāvartayatīti tatprasādārthaṃ sarvo 'pyayaṃ sādhanasandarbha ityuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1318: tato yadyapi na sūtrākṣarebhyo bhagavatprasādo labhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1321: evamuktena nyāyena na jñānasyaivāyaṃ svabhāvo yatsākṣānmokṣasādhanatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1323: sakalakārakāṇāṃ tadadhīnasattāpravṛttitvena tadicchāṃ vinā kasyāpi kāryasyānudayāditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:1326: yena jñānasya mokṣahetutvamaṅgīkṛtaṃ na tenāpi īśvarecchāṃ tyaktuṃ śakyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1332: ānandadaśca muktānāṃ sa evaiko janārdanaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.15 //
GSP33nysu__1u:1335: yaduktaṃ na kāryo mokṣaḥ kintu prācīneṣu mithyājñānādiṣu nivṛtteṣu kāraṇābhāvādevottarapravāhānutpādamātram /
GSP33nysu__1u:1345: kiñca loke tāvadanādiḥ prāgabhāvo nivartate sugatānāṃ tattvapatibhāvanāprakarṣeṇānādivāsanāsantānānāṃ nivṛttiriṣyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1368: tatra kiṃ nivartakābhāva upādhiranenocyate kiṃ vā nivartakasadbhāvena satpratipakṣatā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1375: yadapi prāgabhāve vyabhicārodbhāvanaṃ tadapi bhāvatvena hetuviśeṣaṇādayuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1392: svayameva hyanādibhāvarūpaṃ yadvijñānena vilīyata ityajñānalakṣaṇamabhidhāya bhāvarūpāmānasādhanāya pramāṇānyupanyastāni /
GSP33nysu__1u:1408: ādye dhūmavānagnimāniti sāmānyavyāpteḥ parvato niragnika iti viśeṣavyāptirbalavatī prasajyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:1414: yadanādi tadajñānātiriktaṃ na nivartata iti saṅkocanīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1415: na punaryadanāditvarahitaṃ tadeva jñānanivartyamiti saṅkocyamityatra niyāmakābhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1419: vyāptibalenājñānasya jñānanivartyatve siddhe 'nāditvasya tatraiva vyabhicāra iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1422: anāditvenājñānasyānivatyartve siddhe 'jñānatvasya tatraiva vyabhicāra iti kiṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1433: kiñca tu śuktikājñānaṃ nāma kiṃ jñānābhāvo 'tha bhāvarūpamajñānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1445: yadapi nirupādānasya vināśānupapattimāśaṅkayoktaṃ svāśrayagatottarāvasthā vināśa iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1447: anupādānabhūtāśrayottarāvasthā cedāśritavināśaḥ syāttadā bhūtalādapasārite ghaṭe ghaṭavināśaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1448: paramāṇuśyāmatāpratibandī tu tasyā api sopādānatvenaiva nirasteti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1450: yattāvadavidyāyā anāditvenānivṛttiriti so 'yaṃ prasaṅgaḥ svatantrānumānaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1461: etena nivartakābhāvasyopādhitvam tadviparyayasya pratipakṣatvaṃ ca samāhitam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1463: nanvavayavatatsaṃyogavināśābhyāṃ dravyanāśo dṛṣṭastatkathamatra vināśa iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1484: sākṣātkṛtabrahmaṇāṃ sadyaḥ śarīrādipāte vātaputrīyāḥ pauruṣeyā brahmopadeśāḥ prasajyeranniti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1489: yena so 'pi kathaṃ teṣāṃ neti paryanuyujyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:1490: bhakteḥ parāvasthā hi taddheturuktā tatsampattiśca kāryagamyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1501: vastutastu bhagavāneva anāderapi bandhasya nivartaka iti sādhūktaṃ“jñānināṃ mokṣadaśca saḥ'; iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1510: tato 'vidyāyāṃ nivṛttāyāmapi nāśeṣānandābhivyaktiryāvadīśvara eva svakīyāṃ bandhaśaktiṃ na tato vyāvartayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:1516: evaṃ tāvatsvamatena sūtraṃ vyākhyāya tatpariśuddhaye pareṣāṃ bhāṣyaṃ dūṣayati- bandhamithyātvamityādinā //
GSP33nysu__1u:1517: māyāvādinā hi kartṛtvabhoktṛtvadoṣasaṃsargakriyākārakaphalalakṣaṇasya bandhasyā'tmanyāropitatvena mithyātvaṃ svabhāṣyādau varṇitam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1522: svapadāni ca varṇyante bhāṣyaṃ bhāṣyavido viduriti hi bhāṣyalakṣaṇamācakṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1526: tatrāthāto brahmajijñāsetisūtre anuvādatvaparihārāya śāstre puruṣapravṛttisiddhaye ca kartavyeti padamadhyāhāryam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1527: jijñāsāpadaṃ cānuṣṭhānayogyasyāntarṇītasya vicārasyopalakṣaṇamiti sthite sādhanacatuṣyayasampannasya brahmajñānāya vicāraḥ kartavya iti sūtravākyasya śrauto 'rthaḥ sampadyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1529_1: mokṣasādhanabrahmajñānāya vedāntavākyavicāraḥ kartavya iti sūtravākyasya tātparyeṇa
GSP33nysu__1u:1530: evaṃca śāstre prekṣāvatpravṛttyaṅgatayā 'rthataḥ sūtritasya prayojanāderupapādakaṃ bandhamithyātvamiti tadapi sūtrārtha eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:1538: tena sūtrakāreṇaiva brahmajñānamanarthahetunibarhaṇaṃ sūtrayatāvidcāhetukaṃ kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ pradarśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:1541: tasya cāhaṃ kartā bhokteti pratīyamānaṃ rūpaṃ yadi paramārthikaṃ syāt tadāsandigdhatayā vicāraviṣayatā na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1543: pāramārthikaṃ niṣkrayaṃ niṣkalaṃ brahmarūpaṃ syāttato 'sya sandidhatayā viṣayatocyamānopapadyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1544: tenātmasvarūpaṃ vicāraviṣayaṃ sūtrayatā sūtrakṛtaiva kartṛtvādyatadākārasya mithyātvaṃ sūtritaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:1545: kartṛtvāderbandhasya mithyātvaṃ ca yāvatā vinā nopapadyate tadapi sūtritameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:1557: ato yaḥ kaścid arthaḥ śabdasāmarthyenārthavaśādvā pratīyate sa sarvastadartha eveti bhavatyayamarthakalāpastanmahimādhigataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1568: asya śāstrasyaidaṃparyaṃ sukhaikatānasadātmakūṭasthacaitanyaikarasatāsaṃsāritvābhimatasyātmanaḥ pāramārthikaṃ svarūpamiti vedāntāḥ paryavasyantīti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1569: taccāhaṃ kartā sukhī duḥkhīti pratyakṣābhimatenābādhitakalpenāvabhāsena viruddhayate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1570: atastadvirodhaparihārārthaṃ brahmasvarūpapiparītarūpamavidyānimittamātmana iti yāvanna pratipādyate tāvajjaradgavādivākyavadanarthakaṃ pratibhāti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1578: yatkhalu pramitamapyanupapadyamānaṃ svopapattaye yadapekṣate tattadākṣipati nānyat /
GSP33nysu__1u:1579: yathā jīvato devadattasya gṛhe 'bhāvo bahirbhāvaṃ na punaḥ śabdānityatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1582: evaṃca prayojanatayoktā muktiryadi bandhamithyātvāmapekṣeta tadā tadākṣipet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1592: yathā ca mithyābhūtasya svāpnanigaḍabandhasya prabodhenaiva sākṣāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1593: tatra brahmajñānātsaṃsārabandhanivṛttiḥ sūtritā kaṃ pakṣamavalambyatāmiti sandihyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1598: dṛṣṭvaiva taṃ mucyata iti śrutirdarśanamokṣāvantarā kiñcinna sahata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:1609: pramite ca sādhyasādhanabhāve kā nāmānupapattiryacchamanāyopapādakaṃ mṛgyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1610: nanu yathāgneyādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ yāgānāmapūrvakāraṇabhāve śrute 'pi kālāntarabhāvipradhānāpūrvasādhanatvopapattyarthaṃ kramabhāviyāgajanyāni madhyavartīnyavāntarāpūrvāṇi kalpyante /
GSP33nysu__1u:1611: yathā vā śrutasyaiva yāgasya svargasādhaśratvasyopapattaye 'pūrvaṃ kalpyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1625: anādeścājñānasya nivṛttāvātmano 'pi nivṛttiḥ kiṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1628: kvedamupalabdhaṃ bhavatā yatsatyaṃ na nivartata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1629: nivṛttāvanāditvamaprayojakīkṛtya mithyātvaṃ prayojakīkurvatājñānasya yena kenāpi nivṛttiḥ kasmānneṣyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1632: hanta tarhi virodhisadbhāva eva nivṛttau prayojaka iti kuta ātmanivṛttiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1635: nanu jñānena satyaṃ nivartamānaṃ kiṃ viṣayagataṃ nivartate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1639: yataścitrāvayavini nīlaviśiṣṭadravyajñānaṃ svaviṣayaṃ vā svaviṣayasamavetaṃ vā rasādikaṃ virodhinaṃ vā pītimādiguṇaṃ na nivartayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:1646: yadi jñānamāśrayagataṃ nivartayet tadā dharmādikamapi nivartayedityatra vyāptyayogāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1653: ekameva hi citraṃ nāma rūpamāśrayavyāpyavṛttīti padārthavidaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1656: astu vā jñānamajñānasyaiva nivartakamiti vyāptistathātrapa bandhamithyātvaṃ naiva muktirapekṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1662: api ca satyasyāpi viṣasya garuḍadhyānena nivṛttidarśanādbandhamithyātvaṃ naiva muktirapekṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1668: tarhi tadeva na jñānānnivṛttamiti na mithyābhūtasyāpi jñānānnivṛttiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1673: tato varaṃ sa eva prayojaka ityaṅgīkāro lāghavāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1680: yadi kriyāparispandaḥ sa tarhyatīndriyāśrito 'tīndriya ityaparokṣāvabhāsavirodho rūparahitatvena tadavabhāsavirodhaśca /
GSP33nysu__1u:1681: yadi ca mānasī sṛṣṭiriti matam anumatametat /
GSP33nysu__1u:1706: nanu yathā mithyābhūtācchaśaviṣāṇādervyāvṛttau dhvaṃsaḥ satye paryavasyatīti bhavatocyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1707: tathā satyāccidātmano 'pi vyāvṛttau mithyābhūte paryavasyatīti mayāpi vaktuṃ śakyata eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:1708: satyamāpātatastathā tathāpyapi sautrī arthāpattiḥ sandehāskanditā kuṇṭhitaiva /
GSP33nysu__1u:1715: api caivam- uktirbrahmajñānaṃ jīvagataṃ bandhaṃ nivartayatīti sautrī prayojanoktirbandhamithyātvaṃ nāpekṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1716: yadi jīvajñānaṃ jīvagatasya bandhasya nivartakamiti prayojanoktiḥ sūtre syāttadā kathañcidapekṣetāpi bandhamithyātvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1717: nacaivaṃ sūtrakṛdāha- nahi śuktikāyāmāropitaṃ rajataṃ ghaṭajñānānnivartate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1718: brahmajñānaṃ nāma tvaṃpadārthasya jīvasya tatpadārthena brahmaṇaikyānubhava iti tu svagoṣṭhīniṣṭhaṃ pralāpamātram /
GSP33nysu__1u:1721: api ca yadi bandhamithyātvaṃ yadi ca jñānamātrādbandhabādhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1722: tadā jñāne sati kimapi muktirnaivāpekṣata iti sadya eva sākṣātkṛtabrahmaṇāṃ śarīrādinivṛttiḥ prasajyetetyarthāpattestarkavirodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1728: yadi hi sūtre jīvātmano viṣayatayoktiḥ syāttadā sā tasya sandigdhatāsiddhaye katṛtvādibandhamithyātvaṃ kathañcidapekṣetāpi /
GSP33nysu__1u:1736: eṣā hi brahmaṇyeva pramāṇābhāsapratipannasya jīvābhedādereva mithyātvamapekṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1737: yadi hi jīvasya brahmatāyāṃ sakalavedāntaparyavasānaṃ pratipādayitumidaṃ śāstraṃ pravṛttaṃ syāttadā virodhaśāntyai bandhamithyātvāpekṣā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1749: na kevalaṃ bandhamithyātvaṃ naiva muktirapekṣate kiṃ nāma bandhasya mithyātvaṃ nāstītyapisambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1753: tathātve vā pramāṇavaiyarthyaṃ pūrvapramāṇasyāpi tathātvenānavasthā ca syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1756: evaṃ tarhi paricitacarapuruṣasya divābhuñjānasya pīnatvamanupapadyamānaṃ rasāyanasiddhiṃ yogarddhiṃ vā kasmānnākṣipet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1763: asiddhaṃ sādhayati pramāṇaṃ na tu pramāṇaviruddhamiti hi prasiddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:1769: vayamapi hi bandhamithyātvamahaṃ kartā bhoktā sukhī duḥkhītyādipratyakṣaviruddhatvādeva nārthāpattiprameyamiti brūmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1773: ceṣyādiliṅgairahamityeva yo vedya ityādyāgamaiścātmanaḥ kartṛtvādyupetasyaiva pramitatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1776: nanu pratyakṣaṃ bandhasvarūpamātraṃ gocarayati na tu tasmin mithyātvābhāvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1779: pratyakṣaṃ khalu bandhaṃ gocarayadastīti nāstīti vā gocarayet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1791: na caitānyupakramādivaśādīdṛgātmatattvamabhidadhati tatparāṇi santi śakyāni kenāpyupacaritārthāni kartum /
GSP33nysu__1u:1793: yeyaṃ caitanyasya svata eva sthitalakṣaṇabrahmarūpatāvabhāsaṃ pratibadhya jīvatpāpādikavidyākamarpūrvaprajñāsaṃskāracitrabhittiranādiranirvācyavidyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1795: saca cidātmano buddhayā niṣkṛṣṭa vedāntavādibhirantaḥkaraṇaṃ mano buddhirahaṃpratyayīti ca vijñānaśaktiviśeṣamāśritya gīyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1799: tadevamahaṃ kartā bhoktā sukhī duḥkhītyādipratyakṣe śrutyādivirodhena pūtikūṣmāṇḍīkṛte bandhamithyātvavyutpādanamupapannataramityata āha- mithyātvaṃ yadīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:1812: ata eva hyasataḥ sadajāyatetyādivākyapratipanno 'rthaḥ kutastu khalu somyaiyaṃ syātkathamasataḥ sañjāyetetyupapattiviruddhastyajyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1815: evaṃ yadi duḥkhāderātmātiriktasya samastasya mithyātvaṃ śrutyādibalena syāttarhi tasya śrutyādivākyasya tāvanmithyātvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1817: anyathā svasminnevāsya prāmāṇyaṃ pratihatamiti na kañcidarthaṃ pratipādayet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1818: yadi cedaṃ vākyaṃ mithyā syāttathāpi na duḥkhādermithyātvaṃ pratipādayet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1830: kriyājñāne prati kārakāntarāprayojyatvādilakṣaṇaṃ kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ ca parameśvarāyattamātmani svato vidyata eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:1836: tāṃścātmano viviktānapi vispaṣṭatayānupalabhamānastaddharmānduḥkhādīṃtsatyānevātmīyatvena paśyaṃstatkṛte nīcoccatvalakṣaṇe vikṛtī satye eva pratipadyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1837: tato rāgadveṣābhyāṃ prayuktastadvinivṛttaye yatkaroti tadapyetādṛgevātanotītyanekayoniṣu bambhramīti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1838: na kvāpyātyantikaṃ tadupaśamaṃ labhate vinā paramapuruṣārādhanāditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:1842: atastannirākaraṇanirbandho yukta evetyetatparibhāvayituṃ bandhamithyātvamiti saṃmugdhe prastute 'pi duḥkhāderiti niṣkṛṣṭoktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1847_1: puraskṛtya sarve pramāṇaprameyavyavahārā laukikāḥ pravṛttāḥ sarvāṇi ca śāstrāṇi ityādinā
GSP33nysu__1u:1850: nacānenāntaḥkaraṇaśarīrendriyaviṣayāṇāṃ taddharmāṇāṃ duḥkhādīnāṃ ca mithyātvaṃ siddhayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:1889: na cāyamasti niyamo yatsmaryamāṇamaśeṣasambandhiviśeṣasahitaṃ smaryata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1893: vakṣyati ca sūtrakāraḥ saiva hi satyādaya iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1898: atrāpi yaḥ sthāṇuḥ sa puruṣa itivadvayakhyānamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:1903: yatprakṛtipariṇāmavāci makārāntamavyayamahaṃpadaṃ na jātu tadātmani prayujyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1904: yaccātmavāci dakārāntāsmacchabdajaṃ tanna kadācidapi māyāpariṇāme prayujyata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1905: tadevaṃ sarvamithyātvaparatve śrutereva mithyātvaprasaṅgenāsādhakatvāpattau duḥkhādibandhamithyātvāsiddhayā na pratyakṣamatattvāvedakamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1911: vākyena sakṛdeva jātāyāḥ sakalamithyātvaviṣayāyā buddheḥ prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇāya parīkṣakabuddhaya eva tadviṣayaṃ buddhayā vibhajya krameṇāvagāhanta ityadoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1914: mithyāyāḥ sādhakatvaṃ ca na siddhaṃ prativādinaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.17cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:1918: mayā mithyābhūtasyaiva sādhakatvābhyupagamādityata āha- mithyāyā iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:1926: dvitīyastu satyasyaiva sādhakatvamiti manyamāno yadīdaṃ vākyaṃ sakalamithyātvaṃ pratipādayettadā sakalāntargatatvātsvayamapi mithyā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1928: yadi caitadvākyaṃ mithyā syānna kasyāpyarthasya sādhakaṃ syādityaniṣyaprasaṅgaṃ paśyankathaṃ tvadabhyupagamamātreṇa svatarkasya viruddhatāṃ pratipadyeteti /
