GSP33nysu__1u:2424: asataḥ sādhakatvasyeva tasya sattraividhyasyāpi kathañcana vikalpitapakṣeṣu kasmiṃścana pakṣe naiva siddhiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2439: tatra vyāvahārikasya prapañcasya sadasadvilakṣasya sadvilakṣaṇatvādupapannaṃ śrutyādinā mithyātvasamarthanam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2449: viśvasya sadasadvailakṣaṇyaṃ kiṃ satā pramāṇena sādhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:2456: nanvatra sadasadvailakṣaṇye sādhakatvaṃ na syāditi prasaṅgo vācyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2460: sattvābhāve sādhakatvaṃ na syāditi vā prasaṅgaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2476: asataścāpi viśvasya tenāniṣyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_1,1.24 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2479: vivādapadaṃ sadasadvilakṣaṇaṃ jñānabādhyatvādyadevaṃ tadevaṃ yathā śuktirajatamityanumānaṃ viśvasya sadasadvilakṣaṇatve mānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2489: sato bhāvātmakasya viśvasyāsato 'bhāvādvailakṣaṇyamapi bhāvābhāvabhedavādino mama mate svayaṃ sadastyeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2490: evamasato 'bhāvātmakasya viśvasya sato bhāvādvailakṣaṇyamapi bhedavādinaḥ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2492: kiṃ nāmaivaṃ vibhāgena sadasadvailakṣaṇyasiddhayāpi pratijñātārthasiddherarthāntaratā parasya syāditi // 1 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2494: tadā sato bhāvasyāpi viśvasya sato bhāvādvailakṣaṇyaṃ bhāvabhedavādino mama svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2496: asato 'bhāvādapi vailakṣaṇyaṃ sutarāṃ bhāvābhāvabhedavādinaḥ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2499: sato bhāvādvailakṣaṇyamapi sutarāṃ svayaṃ sadeveti tenāniṣyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // 2 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2502: tathāpi sato bhāvasyāpi viśvasyāsato 'bhāvādvailakṣaṇyamabhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvamapi svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2503: asato 'bhāvasya viśvasya sato bhāvādvailakṣaṇyamapi bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvamapi mama svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2505: yadi hi bhāve 'pyabhāvatvamabhāve 'pi bhāvatvamaṅgīkuryāṃ kutastadā bhāvābhāvabhedavādaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2506: tathāca kathaṃ tena sādhyamānenāniṣyaṃ mama bhavet // 3 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2508: tadā sato bhāvasyāpi viśvasya bhāvābhāvavailakṣaṇyaṃ bhāvābhāvarūpatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ mama svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2514: na bhāvatvamapītyatastena sādhitenāniṣyaṃ mama kathaṃ bhavet // 4 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2515: athaikaikasya vastuno bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvamabhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ ca sādhyatayā vivakṣitamiti manvīta /
GSP33nysu__1u:2516: tathāpi sato bhāvasyāpi viśvasyāsato 'bhāvādvailakṣaṇyamabhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ mama sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2517: evamasato 'bhāvasyāpi viśvasya sato bhāvādvailakṣaṇyaṃ bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2528: tathāpi sato bhāvasyāpi viśvasya sato vailakṣaṇyaṃ bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ mama svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2533: evamasato 'bhāvarūpasyāpi viśvasyāsato vailakṣaṇyamabhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ mama svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2538: atha bhāvābhāvābhimatayoḥ sarvathā bhāvābhāvatve na sta ityartho vivakṣitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2539: tathāpi sata eva bhāvasyaivāsato vailakṣaṇyamabhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2540: yatastasmādviśvasya tena sādhitena bhedavādino 'niṣyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2545: dvau nañau hi prakṛtamarthaṃ sātiśayaṃ gamayataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2546: evaṃ viyadādikaṃ pakṣīkṛtya bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatve sādhyamāne tasyābhāvatvaṃ pratijñātaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2549: tathāca viśvasya bhāvābhāvavibhāgasya ca pareṇābhyupagatatvānna bhāvābhāvabhedavādino mamāniṣyaṃ kiñcit /
GSP33nysu__1u:2555: yataḥ sato bhāvasyaiva viśvasya viyadāderasato vailakṣaṇyamabhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2557: yataścāsato 'bhāvasyaiva viśvasya prāgabhāvādeḥ sato vailakṣaṇyaṃ bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2559: yataścāsato 'bhāvasyaiva viśvasya prāgabhāvādeḥ sato vailakṣaṇyaṃ bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2560: ato bhedavādinastena viparītena pratijñātenāniṣyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2563: vyāvahārikabhāvatvābhāvatvagocaraṃ pramāṇaṃ tattvaviṣayeṇānumānenaiva bādhyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:2567: viśvasya sataḥ satyādvailakṣaṇyamapi mama svayaṃ svamatameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2573: sato vidyamānasyāpyasato bhedaṃ vadato mama yathā viśvasyāsato vailakṣaṇyaṃ svayameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2574: tathā sato 'pi viśvasya sato vailakṣaṇyaṃ satāṃ bhedavādinaḥ svayameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2577: tadāpi sato viśvasyāsato vailakṣaṇyaṃ sadasadbhedavādinaḥ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2581: asata eva hi sato vailakṣaṇyaṃ sattvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ bhedavādino mama svayaṃ sadeva niyamena bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:2582: tathāca viśvasya tena sattvānadhikaraṇatvena sādhitenāsattvāpattyā parasyaivāniṣyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2583: aniṣyaprasaṅgena paraṃ nigṛhītavato mamāniṣyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // 10 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2585: athāsattvānadhikaraṇatve vādiprativādisiddhe sattvānadhikaraṇatvamapyadhikaṃ sādhyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:2587: kiñca, na sattvaṃ nāmaikamanugataṃ kintu prativastu sattvāni bhidyante /
GSP33nysu__1u:2588: tatra viyadāderasadvailakṣaṇye sati sattvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ sādhyamānaṃ kimekasattvānadhikaraṇatvamutānekasattvānadhikaraṇatvamatha sarvasattvānadhikaraṇatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2592: viśvasyāsato 'pi vailakṣaṇyaṃ tāvanmama svayameva sato 'pi vailakṣaṇyaṃ sattvānadhikaraṇatvamapi svayameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2595: tathāca siddhena tena sādhyamānena mamāniṣyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2608: yataḥ sata evāsato vailakṣaṇyaṃ svayaṃ tadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2610: yataścāsata eva sato vailakṣaṇyamapi niyatamevātastena sādhyamānena viśvasya sadasattvāpattyā bhedavādinaḥ kathamaniṣyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2613: dvayorapi sarvathā pratiṣedhātkathaṃ sadasattvaprasaṅga iti cettarhyasata eva sato vailakṣaṇyaṃ svayaṃ sanniyatameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2614: ataḥ sadvailakṣaṇyamuktavā punarasato 'pi vailakṣaṇyena vyāhatena pratijñātena bhedavādinaḥ kathamaniṣyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2615: evaṃ sata evāsato 'pi vailakṣaṇyaṃ niyatamityasadvailakṣaṇyamuktavā punarviśvasya sadvailakṣaṇyapratijñā vyāhatā draṣṭavyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:2617: asmādeva hetostatsiddhiriti cettarhi mātā vandhyeti pratijñā kuto vipratiṣiddhā /
GSP33nysu__1u:2619: “sambhāvitaḥ pratijñāyā arthaḥ sādhyeta hetunā'; iti nyāyāttatra hetvākāṅkṣaiva nāstīti cetsatyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2620: kiñca sata eva viśvasyāsato vailakṣaṇyaṃ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2622: atastena bādhitena sarvathā sattvānadhikaraṇatvena pratijñātena bhedavādinaḥ kathamaniṣyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2626: kecitte tavāniṣyaṃ kataṃ na bhavediti vyācakṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:2627: tatra na pādādāviti pratiṣedhasya nañā nirdiṣyamanityamiti samādhānamavaseyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2630: sanmātratvaṃ brahmaṇo 'pi tasmāt tadapi no bhavet // MAnuv_1,1.25 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2638: anekasattvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ viśvasya sādhyamityucyate tarhi satāṃ bhedasaṃsthitistataścāpasiddhāntaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2649: yadi sarvasmātsato vailakṣaṇyaṃ sarvasattvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ viśvasya sādhyatayocyate tarhi sadbhedasaṃsthitiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2668: yadi sattaiva nāsti tadā tadanadhikaraṇatvapratijñā vyārthā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2672: santi sattādhikaraṇāni santīti cettarhi kānīti vaktavyāni /
GSP33nysu__1u:2684: tathāhi sattāsāmānyavidhurasyāpi brahmaṇaḥ sanmātratvaṃ svarūpasattvaṃ tāvadasti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2688: arthakriyākāritvaṃ jñānābādhyatvaṃ vā sattvamiti pakṣadvayaṃ sphuṭadoṣatvānna dūṣitam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2696: tvayāpi dve tattve sadasidati tattvaṃ vyavasthāpayatā yadeva sattvena vyavasthāpitaṃ tasyaiva mayāpyaṅgīkārānna sacchabdārthāniruktiriti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2704: vijñātasyānyathā samyag vijñānaṃ hyeva tanmatam // MAnuv_1,1.26 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2711: jñānabādhyatvaṃ hi jñānanivartyatvaṃ vā pratipannopādhau niṣedhapratiyogitvaṃ vā hetutvena parasyābhimatam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2719: api tarhyajñānopādānakasya samāne viṣaye virodhitā jñānenopādāne nivṛtte svayameva vilapanam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2721: “ajñānasya svakāryeṇa vartamānena pravilīnena vā saha jñānena nivṛttibādhaḥ'; iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2725: tathāvidhamapi jñānabādhyatvaṃ pakṣaikadeśe prakṛtyādau na siddhaṃ prativādina iti bhāgāsiddhatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2727: naca vipakṣe kiñcidbādhakamastītyato 'prayojakatvājjñānabādhyatvaṃ na siddhamapi vyāpyatvāsiddhamapīti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__1u:2730: sato vināśe caitanyasyāpi vināśaprasaṅga iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2736: nanu ca nehanānāstītipratipannopādhau śrautaniṣedhātmā bādhaḥ prapañce 'stīti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:2741: kiṃ tvadabhimataṃ jñānabādhyatvamatra hetūkriyate kiṃ vāsmadabhimatamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2745: hi yasmādanyathāvijñātasya samyagvijñānameva bādhastadviṣayatvameva tadbādhyatvaṃ matamasmākam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2747: satyo 'pyātmā dehādyātmanā vijñāto vedāntajanitasamyagvijñānavṛttiviṣaya iti pareṇāpyaṅgīkāryam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2772: bādhyatvamiti prakṛtaprakṛtyarthaṃ bādhyaṃ taditi sāmānyena parāmṛśati /
GSP33nysu__1u:2778: rajatatvādinā vijñātasya purovartinaḥ śuktitvādinā vijñānaṃ khalvanyathāvijñātasya samyagvijñānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:2779: evamasato rajatasya sattvādināvagatasyāsattvādinā vijñānamapyanyathāvijñātasya samyagvijñānaṃ bhavatyeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2780: samyagvijñānaṃ bādha ityevokte sarvamapi samyagjñānaṃ bādhaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:2783: anyathāvijñātasya jñānamityevokte dhārāvāhikabhrame rājatatvenāvagatasya śuktikāśakalasya punarnāgavaṅgatvādijñāne 'pi prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2787: tena ghaṭasyaiva paṭādyapekṣayānyathā ghaṭatvena jñānasya punarghaṭatvena jñāne prasaṅgo nirastaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2790: evamekenānyathāvijñātasya puruṣāntarasambandhini tasyaiva vā puruṣasya kālāntarabhāvinyājānasiddhe samyagvijñāne prasaṅgo 'pīti cenmaivam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2824: tatra yāvatsu pakṣeṣu siddhāthartvaparyavasānaṃ tāvatsvanirvacanīyatvasya sattvāvirodhitvena na sanprapañcaḥ kintvanirvacanīya ityārambhāsaṅgatirdeṣo 'vagantavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2827: tatra sata eva sattvena pramitasyaiva viyadāderviśvasyāsadvilakṣaṇatvameva svayaṃ sat /
GSP33nysu__1u:2828: evamasata evāsattvena pramitasyaiva śuktirajatāderviśvasya sarvasyāpyāropitasya sadvilakṣaṇatvameva svayaṃ sat /
GSP33nysu__1u:2833: ato 'sambhavinā tena lakṣaṇenoktena kathaṃ te 'niṣyaṃ nigrahasthānaṃ na bhavedityādiyojanā draṣṭavyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:2834: bhedavādina ityanena māyāvādino viyadādau sadvailakṣaṇyāṅgīkāraḥ śuktirajatādau cāsadvilakṣaṇatvābhyupagatirāgrahamātramalaivetyabhipraiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2843: sattvenāsattvena ca vicārāsahatvamanirvacanīyatvaṃ na punaḥ sattvāsattvadharmānadhikaraṇatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2844: brahma tu sattvena vicārasahaṃ kathamanirvacanīyaṃ syāditi cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:2846: kiñca yo viyadādau vicāraḥ sa brahmaṇyapi samāna iti kathaṃ na tasyānirvacanīyatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2854: tathāpi viyadādau nitye nityatvādeva śuktirajatādau cāsatvānna siddhamityavyāptiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2855: yadi ca pratipannopādhau niṣedhapratiyogitvaṃ tadapi viyadādau na siddhamityavyāptireva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2863: tatprasañjitānyathā'kāraloḍanaṃ samyagvijñānameva bādha ityavadhāraṇatayā matāntarāṇi nirastāni veditavyāni /
GSP33nysu__1u:2868: iha khalu kecidyathārthameva sarvavijñānamiti manyamānā nānyathākhyātiṃ sahante /
GSP33nysu__1u:2873: kiñca śuktikāyā rajatākārapariṇāmaḥ kiṃ sakāraṇa utākāraṇaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2880: duṣyakaraṇasaṃsargo heturiti cettathāpi kiṃ śuktitvāpagamena rajatarūpapariṇāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2882: ādye puruṣāntareṇāpi tadā śuktitvaṃ na pratyetavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2885: atha punaḥ śuktayākāreṇa rajataṃ pariṇatamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:2893: kiñca doṣavaśādrajatākāreṇa pariṇatā cecchuktistadā doṣāpagame 'pi tathaiva kathaṃ nāvatiṣṭhate /
GSP33nysu__1u:2898: saṃyogapradhvaṃsastu na kadāpi nivartate punaḥ saṃyogalakṣaṇo mukulībhāvastu śītādinodanajanya eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2902: kiñcotpannaṃ cedrajataṃ vinaṣṭaṃ tadā tathaiva pratītiḥ syāt na punarnedaṃ rajatamiti bādhabuddhiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2905: nahi mṛdo ghaṭākārapariṇāmasya nimittaṃ daṇḍacakrādikaṃ doṣatvena manyante /
GSP33nysu__1u:2906: kiñca yasyāḥ pratītestadālambanaṃ tata eva tajjanma kiṃvā pratītyantarāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2909: utpanne hi rajate tadālambanāyāḥ pratīterjanma, tasyāṃ jātāyāṃ rajatotpattiriti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2930: tathā hi kiṃ vastuno vastvantarātmanā satī utāsatī /
GSP33nysu__1u:2948: na tāvatsadasadbhāvamātreṇālambanaṃ sadbhāvamātrasya sarvavastupratyayasādhāraṇyena sarvapratyayānāṃ sarvārthālambanatvāpatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2962: yena yasyātiśaya utpadyate sa tasya viṣaya iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2963: atiśayo hi jñātatā vā syādvayavahāro vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:2975: nahi rūpādijñānamutpādayaccakṣurākāśādinā na sannikṛṣṭata iti yujyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:2976: pratyabhijñā ca tattāsannikṛṣṭakaraṇajanyā na tadviṣayā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2982: tatra rajatajñāne śuktiravabhāsate na veti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2983: avabhāsata iti bruvāṇaḥ ślāghanīyaprajño devānāṃ priyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2984: yadi saṃvidi bahumānavānneti brūyāttadā kathaṃ tacchuktikālambanaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2985: kiñca rajatamavabhāsate śuktikālambanaṃ cedatiprasaṅgaḥ kataṃ pariharaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2986: nanu rajatāvabhāsasya rajataviṣayakatve tena rajatena bhavitavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2999: na khalu jarāmaraṇavidhvaṃsaheturjātu sudhā taddheturapi bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3007: na khalu duṣyaṃ kuṭajabījaṃ vaṭaṃ janayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3012: kiñca pradarśitākāravyabhicāre pratyayasya sarvatra vyabhicāraśaṅkā durvārā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3014: tathāhi jñānameva khalu sarvatra vastuvyavasthāpakaṃ nānyat /
GSP33nysu__1u:3020: naca vācyaṃ yathā ghaṭādeḥ pārthivasya vahnivyabhicāre 'pi na dhūmasyāpi tadvayabhicāraḥ śaṅkayate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3023: asti hi tatra pārthivatvāviśeṣe 'pyavyabhicāraniścayopāyo dhūmatvādirevāvāntaro viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3033: saṃvādakamapi jñānameveti tadapi kathaṃ saṃśayāspadaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3038: api ca pratīyamāno 'yaṃ rajatākāraḥ kutastya iti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3052: tanmātraṃ ca gṛhītaṃ sadṛśatayā saṃskārodbodhakrameṇa rajatasmṛtiṃ janayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3054_0: tathāca rajatasmṛteḥ purovṛttigrahaṇasya ca mithaḥ svarūpato viṣayataśca bhedāgrahaṇātsannihitarajatajñānasārūpyeṇedaṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:3054_1: rajatamiti bhinne api grahaṇasmaraṇe abhedavyavahāraṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaṃ ca pravataryataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3070: naca dahanakāryaṃ kathaṃ doṣaḥ karotīti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3072: jāṭharāgnipariṇatā hi rasāḥ śarīropacayahetavo na bhasmakapariṇatāstathā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3080: padātpadārthasmṛtau hariharādismṛtau ca vyabhicārāt kiñcānubhūtaṃ tāvanna samastaṃ smaryate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3088: nanvevaṃ satyanāsvāditatiktasya śiśostiktasmaraṇānupapatteḥ kathaṃ tikto guḍa iti pratyaya iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:3091: athavā nāyaṃ niyamo grahaṇasmaraṇe evāgṛhītaviveke vyavahārādipravartake iti kintu kvacidgrahaṇe eva mitho 'gṛhītabhede /
GSP33nysu__1u:3093: atra hi viniryannayanaraśmivartinaḥ pittadravyasya pītatvaṃ doṣavaśāddravyarahitaṃ gṛhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3098: pittaṃ tu ājarvāvasthitaṃ kācamiva svacchaṃ na pratibandhakamiti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3108: tathāca tata eva sarvasyopapattau kiṃ viparyayakalpanayā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3111: tadupapattau cāgṛhītavivekasya jñānadvayasya bhrāntitvamapi lokasiddhaṃ siddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:3115: nanvatra vigītapratyayo nāma kiṃ purovartinirvikalpakajñānamuta sadṛśadarśanotthaṃ rajarasmaraṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3123: tathāstyeva ca tatsamutthaṃ savikalpakamidamiti vedanātsavivādabhedābhedaṃ rajatavedanam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3124: tatra vipratipannau bhedābhedau vihāyedaṃ rajatamityavagamamātramidaṃ rajatamityādisāmānādhikaraṇyavyavahārakāraṇaṃ pakṣatvena vivakṣitaṃ cetko virodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3131: bhede hi vedanayoridaṃ vedanam purovatirmātragocaram na rajatavātā vetti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3132: rajatavedanamapi rajatamātragrāhi nedamiti purovartinamanūdya tasyaiva rajatatāmidaṃ rajatamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3137: tato vipratipannākāraṃ parityajyedaṃ rajatamityavagamamātrapakṣīkāre na kaściddoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3138: kathamanyathākhyātivādīdaṃ rajatamiti jñānasya purovartiviṣayatvasādhanāya sādhanamupanyasyannito doṣādvimucyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:3139: atha rajatāthirnaḥ śuktikāyāṃ pravṛttau hetubhūtaṃ jñānaṃ mayā pakṣīkriyata iti cenmoccairvāccaḥ paro 'pi śroṣyati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3140: īśvarajñānena siddhasādhanatā syāditi cettavāpi bādhaḥ kathaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3141: prakṛtapravṛttiheturanīśvarajñānaṃ pakṣīkriyata iti cenmamāpi tathaiva syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3142: tvayeśvarānabhyupagamādvayarthaṃ viśeṣaṇamiti cettarhi māṃ prati tavāpi kathaṃ na vyartham /
GSP33nysu__1u:3143: tathāpi vyāptijñāne siddhasādhanateti cettatraiva tava bādhaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3149: kimidaṃ rajatajñānaṃ nāma rajatasya jñānaṃ rajatajñānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3151: rajataśabdollekhijñānaṃ vā rajatārthinaḥ pravṛttihetujñānaṃ vā rajatamiti jñānaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3168: dvitīye rajatajñānaśabdena yo 'rthaḥ pareṇa vivakṣyate sa evāsmākaṃ heturbhaviṣyati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3169: tathā hi na tāvadādyaḥ kalpaḥ pareṇāṅgīkartumucitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3177: yatra śuktikātadadhastadrajatamastīti vākyaṃ śrutavataḥ śuktijñānamapi rajatāthirpravṛttiheturbhavatīti tasyāpyanyathākhyātitāpātāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3180: ato rajatajñānaṃ nāmoktapakṣeṣu kiñcidaṅgīkṛtya taddoṣo vā pariharaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3183: kecitpunā rajataviṣayaṃ jñānamityeva hetvarthamupagamya rajatetarāviṣayatvaṃ sādhyamaṅgīkṛtya sādhyāviśiṣṭatādoṣaṃ pariharanti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3204: evaṃ sati rajatasyāpi kutaḥ sattvamaṅgīkaraṇīyamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:3208: khaṇḍo gauḥ śuklaḥ paṭa ityādayaḥ sarva eva savikalpakapratyayā vibhramāḥ prasajyeran /
GSP33nysu__1u:3214: kiṃ guṇakriyājātyādeḥ dravyeṇota guṇādīnāmeva parasparamatha guṇāśrayasya kriyāśrayeṇetyādi /
GSP33nysu__1u:3217: na hi śuklaḥ paṭa ityasya śauklayaṃ paṭa ityartho 'bhimato laukikānām /
GSP33nysu__1u:3218: naca calati paṭa ityasya calanaṃ paṭa ityartho 'bhimataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3219: nāpi khaṇḍo gaurityetatkhaṇḍatvaṃ gotvaṃ ca piṇḍa evetyanena samānārtham /
GSP33nysu__1u:3221: daṇḍīti śābdavyavahāre bhedārthapratyayaprayogājjñānamapi tādṛśaṃ kalpyata iti cetsamamatrāpi /
GSP33nysu__1u:3225: ata eva śuklaḥ paṭa ityuktvā śauklayaṃ paṭasyeti vyākartāro bhavanti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3228: na hi śuklaḥ paṭaścalatītyasya śauklayaṃ paṭatvaṃ calanaṃ caikamityarthaścetasi cakāsti pratipattṛṇām /
GSP33nysu__1u:3229: tathā sati daṇḍī kuṇḍalī devadatta ityasyāpi jñānasya daṇḍakuṇḍaladevadattatvatādātmyaviṣayatāpātāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3231: samānamekamadhikaraṇaṃ yeṣāṃ te hi samānādhikaraṇāsteṣāṃ bhāvaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3232: tathāca guṇādīnāmāśrayeṇa parasparaṃ ca bhedaḥ āśrayāṇāṃ cābhedaḥ sphuṭa eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:3239: evañca yatra bhedo na tadabhedena pratibhāsate yaccābhedena pracibhāsate na tatra bheda iti kvātivyāptiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3240: nanu guṇādīnāmāśrayeṇa parasparaṃ cābhedo bhagavato muneḥ siddhāntaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3243: tathāca punaḥ śuklaḥ paṭa ityādipratyayā vibhramāḥ prasaktāḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3249: yadvijñānaṃ yatsannikṛṣṭakaraṇena janyate sa tasya viṣaya ityaṅgīkārāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3256: liṅgasya sādhyadharmisannikarṣo liṅgijñānakāraṇamiti cenna liṅgajñānasya karaṇatayābhyupagamāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3259: tathāpi pratyabhijñāyāṃ tattāṃśena cakṣurāderliṅginā ca liṅgajñānasya vākyārthena vākyajñānasya sannikarṣābhāvādaviṣayatāpattiriti cenna asannikṛṣṭajñāpane 'tiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3264: nahi saṃyogādireva sannikarṣaḥ kiṃ nāma pratyāsattimātram /
GSP33nysu__1u:3271: tarhi manaḥsannikṛṣṭena cakṣuṣā jāyamānaṃ rūpajñānaṃ manoviṣayamāpannamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:3282: astu vā yadvijñānaṃ yatpratibhāsaṃ tattadviṣayamityeva vyavasthā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3286: nahi vayamasminpratyaye śuktitvamāvabhāsata iti brūmo yena virodhaḥ syāt,
GSP33nysu__1u:3289: virodhe vā samīcīnarajata idaṃ rajatamiti pratītirna syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3291: evaṃ sati rajatasyāpi jñānaviṣayatā prasajyata iti cet satyam, iṣyamevaitat /
GSP33nysu__1u:3293: nāpi“śuktikārajate'; iti jñānaṃ vibhramaḥ prasajyate rajatasyāsattvābhyupagamāt,
GSP33nysu__1u:3296: vakṣyati ca viṣayasya kuto bādha ityasato rajatatādātmyorjñānaviṣayatāmācāryaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3302: ādye paśuhiṃsā kiṃ dharmajanane svārasikaśaktimatī utādharmajanana iti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3303: ādye kataṃ kratubāhyāpi dharmaṃ na janayet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3305: sahakārivaśāditi cet aṅgīkṛtaṃ tarhi sahakāriṇāṃ svārasikaśaktipratibandhena viparītaśaktayādhāyakatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3318: guṇā eva na te doṣā iti cet kācādayo 'pi guṇā eva na te doṣā ityuktameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:3323: tathā satīśvarajñānasya nityasyārtho viṣayo na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3324: pratyabhijñānasya ca tattāṃśo viṣayo na bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3330: tatra vyāvartakaṃ kadācidasti rajatādikaṃ kadāpi nāstīti vaiṣamyamiti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3331: tatkiṃ yadākadācitsataḥ kāraṇatvaṃ pūrvakṣaṇe sato vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3335: atha nātītādirarthaḥ svasāmarthyenānumityādikaṃ vyāvartayati yena tatsattāpekṣā syāt,
GSP33nysu__1u:3338: kiñca satyasthale 'pi na sākṣātsākṣātkāraṃ prati kāraṇatvamarthasya kintvindriyasannikarṣasyaiva /
GSP33nysu__1u:3339: saca yatrāsatā nopapadyate tatrārthasattāmapekṣata iti pāramparyeṇaivārthasya kāraṇatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3340: nanu tarhyasatā rajatādinā sannikarṣāyogātkathamindriyeṇa tajjñānajanmeti cenna,
GSP33nysu__1u:3343: yāvatkhalu vigīte pratyaye bhāsate tasya sarvasyāsattve 'satkhyātiḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3346: yaccoktaṃ viṣayavyabhicāre jñānasya savartrānāśvāsa iti tat autsargikaṃ jñānānāṃ prāmāṇyamapavādādviparyaya iti vadatā'cāryeṇaiva parihariṣyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3347: sākṣī khalu caitanyarūpo niyatayāthārthyaḥ kadācidapi saṃśayānāskandito 'ntaḥkaraṇavṛttīnāṃ yāthārthyaṃ svayameva gṛhṇāti,
GSP33nysu__1u:3349: ata evānāśvāsanirasanopāyo na jñāneṣu kaścidviśeṣo 'stīti nirastam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3350: anyathā parasyāpi kathaṃ viṣayavyabhicāre vyavahṛtervyavahārāntare samāśvāsaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3352: kvacidvivekāgrahe ca kathamanyatra viśiṣṭapratyaye viśvāso bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3356: bādhakābhāvādinā viśiṣṭajñānasvarūpaniścayamaṅgīkurvāṇaḥ kathaṃ svaprakāśavijñānavādaṃ na jahyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3363: yā caivaṃ prakriyā rajatamidamityādinoktā sā jñānadvitve rajatajñānasya ca smṛtitve pramāṇābhāvādanupapannā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3366: yastu rajatajñānasya smṛtitve pariśeṣopanyāsaḥ so 'pi pratyutpannaka(kā)
GSP33nysu__1u:3369: rajatajñānavata evotpadyamānatvaṃ vivakṣitamiti cenna tathāpi rajatasaṃskāravyavahārādau vyabhicārāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3376: kiñcedaṃ smaraṇatvaṃ sādhyaṃ na tāvatsāmānyaṃ guṇeṣu prābhākarairabhyupagatam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3393: anyatropakṣayaḥ śaṅkita iti cenna tathāpi sandigdhakālātītatānistārāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3397: asati bādhake na vṛthānyatropakṣayaḥ śaṅkayata iti cet samaṃ prakṛte 'pīti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3404: nedaṃ smṛtiriti vyavahartavyaṃ tattollekhādismṛticinhavikalatvāditi prathamaprayoge vivakṣitatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3407: yadapi viparyayābhyupagame kalpanāgauravamuktaṃ tat vivekāgrahamātreṇa pravṛttyāderupapattau tathāstu /
GSP33nysu__1u:3409: kiñcaivamantyatantusaṃyogaparyantaṃ kāraṇakalāpamupādāya paṭo 'pi nāṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ tanmātreṇa sarvasyopapatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3411: naca tena vinaikatvādipratyayopapattiriti cet viparyaye 'pyevamiti kuto gauravam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3415_0: yathā hi purovartini rajate rajatamidamiti viśiṣṭaviṣayamekameva vijñānaṃ svaprakāśatayā
GSP33nysu__1u:3415_1: vā mānasapratyakṣatayā vā sākṣiṇā vāvabhāsate tathedamapīti kuto 'sya na viśiṣṭaviṣayaikajñānatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3416: na hi tato 'sya mātrayāpi viśeṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3418: kevalamekaṃ tādṛgviṣayasadbhāvādyathārthaṃ tadabhāvāparamayathārthamaviśiṣṭaviṣayamanekamapi tadviśiṣṭaviṣayaikatvena pratibhāsata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:3420: nāstyeva viśiṣṭaviṣayaikatvagrāhipratyaya iti cenna anubhavasiddhajñānāpalāpe smṛtyanubhavasvarūpāpalāpaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3424: kiṃ svarūpam uta pṛthaktavam utānyonyābhāvaḥ athavāvaidharmyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3438: rajatāsambhavinaḥ purovartinīdantvasya purovartyasambhavinaśca rajate rajatatvasya gṛhītatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3441: sa cedaṃrajatatvayoḥ svarūpameva pareṣām iti kathaṃ tadavabhāse nāvabhāseta /
GSP33nysu__1u:3446: atha manyase purovatirno yaḥ śuktitvādidharmo rajatavyāvartako yaśca rajate vyavahitadeśatvādidharmaḥ purovartivyāvartakastayoragrahaṇaṃ pravartakamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3448: purovartino hi śuktitvāgrahe na śuktikārthī tatra pravarteta /
GSP33nysu__1u:3449: rajatasya cāsannihitatvādidharmāgrahe rajatārthī na tatra pravartatām /
GSP33nysu__1u:3452: kimayameva vyavahāro bhedāgrahādanyastvabhedagrahāt, uta sarvo 'pi bhedāgrahāditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:3458: asti tāvatpravartakatvābhimatapratyaye 'pyapekṣitopāyapurovṛttyavagamāṃśayoḥ svarūpato viṣayataśca bhedavirahādeva bhedāgrahaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3464: kiñca pravartakasādṛśyātpravṛttirityatraiva kalpyate uta yadyatsadṛśaṃ tattatkāryakārīti sarvatra niyamaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3467: pravṛttilobhāditthamāsthīyata iti cenna tasyā viparyayāṅgīkārādeva suvyavasthiteḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3470: nanvidaṃ rajatamiti yathā rajatasādhyā buddhī rajatasadṛśācchuktiśakalādbhavati bhavatām /
GSP33nysu__1u:3475: api cedaṃ jñānadvayaṃ pravartakasādṛśyamātrādyadi pravṛttimupajanayennivṛttimapi kutā ena janayet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3477: nanu ca yathā bhedāgraho bhavatāmabhedagrahaṃ janayati tathā pravṛttimapi kiṃ na janayediti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3480: jñānajanane hi kāraṇānāṃ svātantṛyaṃ na puruṣasya /
GSP33nysu__1u:3483: pravṛttau tu puruṣa eva svatantro na jñānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3484: sa hi satyapi jñāne 'pekṣita eva pravartate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3489: kiñca jñānamarthe pravṛttiṃ kiṃ sākṣādupajanayati utecchāprayatnadvāreṇa /
GSP33nysu__1u:3493: purovartipravṛtterhi sākṣātkāraṇaṃ prayatnaḥ, tasya cecchā, tasyāśca samīhitasādhanatānumānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3496: atha rajate pratipannena rajatatvena tatsamīhitasādhanatājñānamupajātaṃ bhedāgraha(bhedagrahe 'bhedagraha)
GSP33nysu__1u:3507: naca tatra saṃsargagrahaḥ pravartakaḥ samavāyo hi tayoḥ saṃsargaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3512: avisaṃvādivyavahārajanakatvaviśiṣṭasākāṃkṣarūparūpisahopalambho hi talliṅgam na cāvisaṃvāditvaṃ prāk pravṛtteḥ śakyādhigamam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3513: asti cedaṃ sakalamapi pravartakaṃ vibhrame 'pīti kuto viparyayābhāve pravṛttyanupapattiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3517: rajatatvena sahāgṛhītāsaṃsargatayā vā rajatādagṛhītabhedatayā vā samīhitasādhanatānumānopapatteriti etadapyayuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3522: nirvikalpake tu vastusvarūpamātramiti bheda iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3529: ata tadvastudarśanasāpekṣadaśarnaṃ nirvikalpake 'cakāsadapi savikalpake bhātīti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3538: tatra kiṃ tadanvayajñānaṃ pravṛttau niyatamutāniyatamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3540: anyathākhyātiṃ vinā na rajatārthinaḥ purovartini pravṛttiriti tāvatsiddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:3543: pratibhāsamānayorasaṃsargāgrahe sati saṃsargagraho 'varjanīyasannidhiriti cenna viparyayasyāpi vaktuṃ śakyatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3549: purovarti vā rajatajñānagocaro rajatajñānagocaro rajatānupāyatve sati tadarthipravṛttiviṣayatvātsamyagrajatavat /
GSP33nysu__1u:3550: vivādapadaṃ rajatajñānamidaṃ jñānānna bhidyate prakāśamānāttato 'prakāśamānabhedatve sati prakāśamānatvātsampratipannarajatajñānavadityādayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3551: kiñca viparyayābhāve nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānasya bādhakatvamanupapadyamānaṃ taṃ gamayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3566: anyathā vimato vyavahāro yathārtho vyavahāratvāt, rajataviṣayo vā rajatavyavahāratvādityapi syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3568: yadapi jñānatvaṃ ca yathārthamātravṛttītyādi, tatra kimidaṃ jñānatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ vā pratiniyataṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3578: meruḥ sarṣapa ityādivāyānmerorapi sarṣapatvena pratibhāsāddṛṣṭāntasya sādhyavaikalyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3579: anyathā tathāvidhavākyābhāsaṃ śrutavatā tatpratiṣedho na kriyetāprasaktatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3581: api caivaṃ satyagniranuguṇa iti bādhitaviṣayasya vākyasya ghaṭaḥ pacatītyapārthakādbhedo na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3584: tadapratītāvāśrayāsiddheḥ, pratītau vyāghātāt dṛṣṭāntasya sādhyasamatvāccetyāstāṃ vistaraḥ // 1 //
GSP33nysu__1u:3594: Nyāyasudhā on Madhva's Anuvyākhyāna 1,1.27-98 MISSING (including Brahmasūtra 1,1.2)
GSP33nysu__1u:3595: [= vol. 2, pp. 269-800, and vol. 3, pp. 1-38 of Pandurangi's edition]
GSP33nysu__1u:3600: anyathā śvetaketūddālakākhyāyikayā pratipāditatvādadvaitamapi na śrutyabhiprāyaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3602: ityapi paropāsanānuvādo na svārthe tātparyavān syāt“atha yo 'nyāṃ devatāmupāste';
GSP33nysu__1u:3608: yata evaṃ jagajjanmādikāraṇatvaṃ svalakṣaṇamatra sūtre brahmaṇo 'bhidhīyate,
GSP33nysu__1u:3611: ato jīvaikyamapi sa nirācakre jagadguruḥ // MAnuv_1,1.99ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:3620: syādayamadvaitināmanupapanno lakṣaṇārambho yadīdaṃ jīvavyāvṛttyarthaṃ lakṣaṇamuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3621: jaḍamātravyāvṛttyarthaṃ tu lakṣaṇe vyākhyāyamāne kathaṃ jīvaikyavādināṃ lakṣaṇasūtrārambho 'nupapanna ityata āha- nahīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3622: nahi janmādihetutvaṃ jīvasya jagato bhavet // MAnuv_1,1.99cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:3624: yatra hi lakṣaṇaṃ nāsti tatsarvaṃ tadvayāvartyamaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3629: kiñcānena lakṣaṇena yadi jīvo na vyāvartyate, kintu so 'pi lakṣyāntargataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3630: tathā sati lakṣaṇasya jīve 'tivyāptimāśaṅkayetaravyapadeśāddhitākaraṇādidoṣaprasaktiriti sūtrakārīyaṃ tannirākaraṇamasaṅgataṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3632: kathañcicchaṅkāyāṃ vā tasyāpi lakṣyatvāṅgīkāraṃ parityajya tatra na lakṣaṇanirākaraṇaṃ kriyata ityāśavānāha- hitākriyeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3633: hitākriyādidoṣaṃ ca vakṣyatyeva svayaṃ prabhuḥ // MAnuv_1,1.100ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:3636_1: paricchinnajñānakriyāśakteḥ saṃsāriṇo hiraṇyagarbhādutpattyādi na sambhāvayitumapi śakyate'; iti,
GSP33nysu__1u:3640: ito 'pi māyāvādināṃ na brahmalakṣaṇasūtrārambhaḥ sambhavatītyāha- nirguṇatvaṃ ceti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3641: nirguṇatvaṃ ca tenaiva niṣiddhaṃ prabhuṇā svayam // MAnuv_1,1.100cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:3644: tato 'nenāpi lakṣaṇāvākyena brahmaṇo jagajjanmādikāraṇatvena tadavinābhūtaiḥ sarvajñatvādibhiśca saṃsargaḥ pratipādanīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3646: nirviśeṣatvavādināṃ ca nirviśeṣatvaṃ niṣedhataḥ sūtrasyārambhaḥ kathamupapadyata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3651: nahi tathāvidhaṃ jagajjanmādikāraṇatvaṃ jīvabrahmaṇorekatvaṃ vā brahmaṇo nirguṇatvaṃ vā viruṇaddhi /
GSP33nysu__1u:3656: su samyak svarūpāntargatyā na lakṣaṇānīti vā tadarthopapatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3657: tarhi yato 'sya janmādi sā māyā tadāśrayo brahmeti nirdeśaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3661: nanu taṭasthenāpi jagajjanmādikāraṇatvena brahmaṇo jīvaikyaṃ nirguṇatvaṃ ca (ni)viruddhayate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3665: tatra kākādhikaraṇatvaṃ tadanadhikaraṇebhyo gṛhaṃ vyāvartayati na vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3667: ādye brahmalakṣaṇamapi kathaṃ na jīvavyāvṛttiṃ karoti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3668: kathaṃ ca tatsambandhena saguṇaṃ na bhavatīti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3670: yo hi kāryakāraṇasaṅghātādaviviktaṃ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvadoṣasaṃsargiṇamātmānaṃ matvā kliśyati sa jīvo vyāvartyata eva te(ane)na lakṣaṇena /
GSP33nysu__1u:3671: tatra yaścaitanyadhātuḥ sa brahmaṇo na bhidyata ityabhyupagame virodhābhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3672: naca satyasya prapañcasya kāraṇabhūtāyāḥ satyāyā māyāyā āśrayo brahmeti sūtrārtho yena brahmaṇaḥ saviśeṣatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3673: kintu yadavaṣṭambho viśvo vivartaḥ prapañcastad brahmeti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3674: sati caivaṃ sūtrārthe kathaṃ jīvabrahmaṇorekatvaṃ brahmaṇo nirguṇatvaṃ ca viruddhayata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3680: taṭasthena jagajjanmādikāraṇatvenātra sūtre lakṣaṇayā brahma pratipādyata iti kuto 'ṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3682: na tāvad brahmaṇo jagajjanmādikāraṇatvasya bādhakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tadagocaratvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3690: janmādyasya yatastad brahmeti lakṣaṇayocyata iti kalpyata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3693: bhedenaiva tu mukhyārthasambhave lakṣaṇā kutaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.101ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:3695: yadi jīvabrahmaṇorekatvaparirakṣaṇāya yathāśrutaṃ sūtrārthaṃ parityajya lakṣaṇāśrīyate tarhi jīvabrahmaṇorbhedenaivāṅgīkṛtena sūtrasya mukhyārthasambhave lakṣaṇā kasmādāśrayaṇīyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3696: nanvabhedamupādāya sūtre lakṣaṇā vā'śrayaṇīyā bhedamupādāya makhyavṛttirveti sandihyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3697: vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ dvitīyaḥ pakṣa eva śreyāniti,
GSP33nysu__1u:3707: ityādinā prakṛtaḥ prekṣāpūrvaṃ tejo 'bannādīnāṃ sraṣṭā sarvāsāṃ prajānāṃ mūlamāyatanaṃ pratiṣṭhā ca sakalāvadyagandhavidhuro 'paricchinnaguṇākaraḥ paramātmā,
GSP33nysu__1u:3721: nanu kiṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ mukhyamupādāya tattvaṃpadayorlākṣaṇikatvaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3722: kiṃvā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ gauṇaṃ gṛhītvā tattvaṃpadayormukhyārthatā vyākhyātavyeti sandehe na vinigamanāyāṃ heturasti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3729: iti vākyaṃ jīvabrahmaṇorekatvaṃ pratipādayatītyatra virodhyākāraparityāgo nāma na tāvadavivakṣāmātramityuktaṃ prāk /
GSP33nysu__1u:3739: nanu ca virodhyākāraparityāgena jīvasya brahmaikyamityasyārtho na virodhyākārāvivakṣāmātreṇeti nāpyanityatveneti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3746: sadaiva guṇavattve 'sya bhinnaṃ syānnirguṇaṃ sadā // MAnuv_1,1.102ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:3749: yadi nirguṇaṃ saguṇādatyantabhinnaṃ tarhyasya saguṇasya nityaṃ saguṇatvāttasmānnityameva nirguṇaṃ bhinnaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:3753: āropapravāhasya cānādinityatayā sadā saguṇatvaṃ ca nāniṣyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3756: yathā vā yadidaṃ rajataṃ sā śuktirityevaṃ pareṇa svābhisandhāvudghāṭite satyāha- naceti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3764: ato guṇarāhityalakṣaṇaṃ nirguṇatvaṃ na sarvathā śakyanirūpaṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3773: nanu (ca)“sākṣī cetā kevalo nirguṇaśca'; iti nirguṇaṃ brahma śrūyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3781: evaṃ dharmarāhityalakṣaṇaṃ nirguṇatvaṃ nirākṛtamapyāgrahamātreṇa yo 'ṅgīkaroti taṃ prati solluṇṭhamāha- nirguṇatvamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3782: nirguṇatvaṃ tadā ca syādāsuratvaṃ nacānyathā // MAnuv_1,1.103ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:3785: ṇatve nirākṛte 'pi yadi nirguṇatvaṃ parasmai ruciṃ syāt tarhi guṇaśabdoditasakalaśubharāhityalakṣaṇamāsuratvameva syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3789: nahi nānāvidhakāryakriyāveśātmatvaṃ tatprasavaśaktayatmakaṃ vā jijñāsyaviśuddhabrahmāntargataṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3796: yadapi guṇaguṇinoranyatvānanyatvābhyāmanirūpaṇāditi lakṣaṇasya taṭasthatvādi siddhaye pareṇoktaṃ taddūṣayitumanuvadati- lakṣyalakṣaṇayoriti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3802: tadubhayamapi lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyādbrahmaṇo bhinnamabhinnaṃ bhinnābhinnaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3810: tathāca“yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante'; ityādiśruteḥ punaruktidoṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3813: naca tadeva tadaiva prasiddhamaprasiddhaṃ ceti yuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3831_0: tatra jagajjanmādikāraṇatvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhedābhāve 'pi viśeṣasya sadbhāvāttadbalena
GSP33nysu__1u:3831_1: sarvamutpadyata iti vaktuṃ nirbhedavastuni pareṇa viśeṣasyānaṅgīkṛtatvāt ghaṭādīnāṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:3831_2: ca mithyātvenāṅgīkṛtānāmanudāharaṇatvātsatya eva vastunyasāvudapapādanīya iti manvāna āha- tadeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3835: yadyevaṃ pṛṣṭvā lakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayasi tadaikyasya gatirnirūpaṇaprakāro na vidyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3847: tattvamasītyādivākyapratipādyamaikyaṃ kiṃ tatpadalakṣitāccaitanyādabhinnamuta bhinnamatha bhinnābhinnamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3848: pareṇāṅgīkṛtatvena prādhānyādabhedapakṣaṃ tāvadādau nirākaroti- aikyābheda iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3849: aikyābhede na śāstreṇa jñeyaṃ tat svaprakāśataḥ // MAnuv_1,1.104cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:3852: aikyasya caitanyasvarūpābhede 'ṅgīkriyamāṇe tadaikyaṃ tattvamasītyādinā śāstreṇa pratipādyaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3859: atha śāstraṃ naikyaṃ pratipādayati kintu bhedabhramaṃ nirākaroti,
GSP33nysu__1u:3881: nanu kathaṃ tarhi so 'yaṃ devadatta iti vākyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3884: bhede mithyātvato bhedasatyatvaṃ syād balādapi // MAnuv_1,1.105ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:3897: nanu na kutrāpi satayo bhedo 'smābhirabhyupeyate tatkathaṃ vyāptiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3900: yayordūrasthayorvanaspatyoraikyaṃ mithyā tayorbhedaḥ satya iti dṛṣṭam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3901_0: athavā yasya svarūpeṇa sato yo 'bhāvo mithyā tasya tadviparītaḥ satyo yathā brahmaṇo
GSP33nysu__1u:3907: tadā vaktavyaṃ tau kiṃ caitanyādabhinnāvuta bhinnau atha bhinnābhinnāviti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3914: sa bhedaḥ kiṃ bhedibhyāṃ bhinno 'bhinno bhinnābhinno vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3919: nanu bhedasya bhedāntaraṃ bhedābhedayośca bhedābhedāntaramityetāvatā nānavasthā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3923: yadyapi bhedābhedāṅgīkāre virodho vaktuṃ śakyate tathāpi sphuṭatvānnoktaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3933: tadā pṛcchāmaḥ svasya nirvāhakaṃ hi svanirvāhakaṃ tasya bhāvaḥ svanirvāhakatā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3936: tathā caikasyaivaikasyāmeva nirvāhakriyāyāṃ karmakartṛtvalakṣaṇaṃ nirvāhyatvaṃ nirvāhakatvamityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3937: tannirvāhyatvaṃ nirvāhakatvaṃ ca parasparaṃ dharmiṇā kriyayā cātyantābhinnamu(tātyaṃ)
GSP33nysu__1u:3940: paryāyo bhedavān vā syādanavasthobhayatra ca // MAnuv_1,1.106b-d //
GSP33nysu__1u:3942: nirvāhyamiti nirvāhakamiti apiśabdānnirvāhakamityapi śabdasamūhaḥ paryāyaḥ prasajyeta ekārthatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3947: yadi nirvāhyatvādirarthaḥ parasparaṃ dharmiṇā na bhedavān syāttadā tadbhedadvayasya bhedisvarūpamātratve paryāyatvādidoṣaprasaṅgādbhedāntaravadityaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3948: tathāca parasparaṃ bhedaṃ dharmibhedaṃ vā'śrityobhayatrānavasthā syāditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:3955: satyajñānādikaṃ parasparaṃ brahmaṇā cātyantābhinnaṃ vā bhinnaṃ vā bhinnābhinnaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3967: nanu satyajñānādīnāṃ parasparaṃ brahmaṇā cātyantamabheda eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:3970: parāparasāmānyavācināṃ saguṇabrahmavācināṃ vā teṣāṃ parabrahmaṇi lakṣaṇayā pravṛttyaṅgīkārāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3971: naca vācyaṃ satyapadena lakṣitasyaiva jñānapadena lakṣaṇāyāṃ vaiyarthyāt,
GSP33nysu__1u:3984: brahmaviśeṣaṇatvenāsatyatvādivyāvṛttilakṣaṇaṃ prayojanaṃ satyādipadānāṃ tvayā vaktuṃ na śakyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3989: vyāvṛttervyāvṛttasya brahmaṇo 'viśeṣatve sā svatantrā vyāvṛttirna prayojanam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3991: mumukṣuṇā brahma vā taddharmo vā jijñāsitavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4002: viśeṣaṇābhidhānamukhena vyāvṛttiḥ padānāṃ prayojanamiti vaktuṃ na śakyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4006: asatyatvādivyāvṛttiḥ padānāṃ prayojanamiti vaktuṃ na śakyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4007: nahi tīre nadītvamanabhidadhato nadīpadasyānadītvavyāvṛttiḥ prayojanaṃ sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:4011: nirviśeṣe svayaṃprakāśamāne virodhyākārāropa evānupapanna iti coktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4015: tattasmādakhaṇḍaṃ nirviśeṣaṃ vākyadvayapratipādyamityetanmataṃ khaṇḍitaṃ dūṣitaṃ veditavyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4025: viśeṣābhāvo hi nirviśeṣaṃ brahmeti vākyena pratipādayitumiṣyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4027: ayamapi viśeṣo nirviśeṣamityanena nirākriyata iti kutastatrāpi svakriyāvirodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4029: tarhyetadvacanakartṛtvamapi mūko 'hamityanena nirākriyata iti kutastatrāpi svakriyāvirodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4050: ata uktaprakāreṇa mahāvākyāvāntaravākyayoranyathānupapattibalādbhedarahite 'pi brahmaṇyayamanupapattiśāntiheturviśeṣo nāma śaktiviśeṣo 'ṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4055: yato bhedahīne 'pi vastunyasti kaścicchaktiviśeṣo yena prakāśamānamapi na prakāśata ityādi yujyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4056: sa ca viśeṣo 'nayaivārthāpattyāvagamyata ityeva tvayā vaktavyamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4059: so 'pi hi viśeṣo yadi vastuno bhinnastarhi bhedānavasthādi doṣaḥ syādabhinnatve ca viśeṣatadvadbhāvānupapattestādavasthyādityata āha- viśeṣeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4065: sa eva viśeṣo viśeṣāntaramantareṇa viśeṣatadvadbhāvaṃ ca ghaṭayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:4066: ekasyaiva nirvāhyatvaṃ nirvāhakatvaṃ ca tadbalādeva siddhayatītyaṅgīkaraṇīyamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4068: nanvabhinne vastuni bhedakāryanirvāhakatvaṃ viśeṣasya kutaḥ pramāṇāt(taḥ)
GSP33nysu__1u:4080: etadubhayānyathānupapattyā bhedarahite 'pi caitanye bhedrapratinidhistatkāyarkārī kaścidatiśayo 'stīti kalpyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4083: asau siddha iti kiṃ tatra pramāṇāntarānveṣaṇeneti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4093: tathā hi paṭastacchauklayaṃ ca tāvanna bhidyete /
GSP33nysu__1u:4099: nāpi kuṇḍamiva paṭo 'dhikaraṇatvena badarāṇīva śauklayamādheyatvena parisphurati /
GSP33nysu__1u:4120_1: 'pi paṭe 'sti kaścidatiśayo bhedapratinidhiryadvaśādidaṃ sarvaṃ samañjasaṃ syādityeva kalpanīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4123: nanu bhedābhedāṅgīkāreṇānupapatteḥ śamanāt kiṃ viśeṣeṇeti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:4132: prāptaṃ tarhi sakalavastūnāmaikyamityata āha- viśeṣā iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4137: te prakṛtasvarūpā viśeṣā aśeṣato vastuṣvananteṣu dravyeṣvanantā eva santi /
GSP33nysu__1u:4140: nanvekaikasmiṃśca dravye viśeṣo 'pyekaiko 'sti tadā paṭo mahāṃśchuklaścalatīti vicitrānekavyavahārānupapattiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4143: tataśca viśeṣāṅgīkāro vyarthaḥ syādityata āha- viśeṣā iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4144: te 'pyuktalakṣaṇā viśeṣā aśeṣato 'pi vastuṣu pratyekamanantāḥ santyato noktadoṣāvakāśaḥ anantā ityupalakṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4145: yatra yāvanto vyavahārāstatra tāvanto viśeṣā iti jñātavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4148: tathāca bhinnanāṃ dravyābhede dravyasyāpi bhedaprasaṅga ityata āha- parampareti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4154: sarvaṃ caitadviśeṣasvarūpasādhakārthāpattyaiva siddhamiti na pṛthak pramāṇamuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4159: tathāpi vipratipanno na tanmātreṇa bodhayituṃ śakyata ityarthāpattirupanyasteti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4165: yatpareṇa pṛṣṭaṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇayorbheda ityādi tasyedamuttaram- brahma nirbhedamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4173: brahma ca guṇāścetyapunaruktabhaṇanaṃ ca yujyata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4175: tvameva brahmaṇo lakṣaṇamabhipretya tatsādhanāya jagajjanmādikāraṇatvalakṣaṇaṃ pratipādayituṃ pravṛttamiti sūcayitum /
GSP33nysu__1u:4176: tadevaṃ jagajjanmādikāraṇatvasya svalakṣaṇatve bādhakābhāvānna taṭasthatvakalpanaṃ yuktamiti siddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:4181: yadi ca sūtrakāreṇa samavāyo nirākariṣyata iti nāṅgīkārārhastadā guṇaguṇinoreva sa kaścittādṛśaḥ svabhāvabheda ityaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4182: nahi paṭādau bhedābhāve 'pi viśeṣabalādvayavahāraviśeṣadarśanamātreṇa brahmaṇyapi tathā kalpayituṃ yuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4190: na punaḥ sambhāvanaivārtha(sya)sādhiketyata āha- evaṃ dharmāniti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4198: mūlaśrutyaṅgīkāre saiva viśeṣābhidhātrī bhaviṣyatīti pramitametannirbhedameva brahma viśeṣabalādeva nānāvyavahārālambanamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4200: atra yatpareṇa jagatkāraṇatvaṃ kiṃ brahmaṇo nimittatvamevotopādānatvamevāthobhayamapīti vimṛśya tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ (pari)gṛhītaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4204: tasmāduktalakṣaṇadvayopapannaṃ brahma nārāyaṇākhyaṃ mumukṣuṇā jijñāsyamiti sthitam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4213: tasya harahiraṇyagarbhādicetaneṣu pradhānādyacetaneṣu ca pāśupatādyāgamānumānāvaṣṭambhenātivyāptimāśaṅkyātra pariharati bhagavāntsūtrakāraḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4236: aparastu saṅkalpavargādyapratyakṣaphalāni vidadhānaḥ śivasya jagajjanmādikāraṇatvasarvajñatvasavarśaktitvasatyasaṅkalpatvādyaśeṣaguṇapūrṇatvaṃ niravadyatvaṃ ca pratipādayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:4244: tataśca tatpraṇetuḥ śivasya paramāptatvamavadhārya taddṛṣṭāntena tatpraṇītasya dvitīyasyāpyāgamasya prāmāṇyamavasīyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4250: anayaiva diśā tattadāgamaprāmāṇyaṃ tattaddevatāvādināṃ pratyavasthānāni draṣṭavyāni /
GSP33nysu__1u:4256: vipratipanne pṛthivyudake, prayatnavatā dhṛte, gurutve satyapātitvāt, sampratipannavat /
GSP33nysu__1u:4258: ityādibhiranumānairviśvodayasthitilayakartari sāmānyataḥ siddhe asmadādīnāṃ tadasambhavāt bhagavāṃśchiva eva pariśeṣājjagajjanmādikartā siddhayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:4260: citrādikāryadaśarnāttadanuguṇa eva kartā kalpyate evaṃ vicitrānekakāryadaśarnāt(nena)
GSP33nysu__1u:4262: athavā kṣityādikaṃ kartetyadantargatameva savarjñatvādikaṃ na yatnāntaramapekṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4271: ṛgyajuḥsāmātharvāścetyādinoktaṃ śāstraṃ yoniḥ kāraṇamabhivyañjakaṃ pramāṇamasyeti śāstrayoni tasya bhāvaḥ śāstrayonitvaṃ tasmāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4273: jagajjanmādikāraṇasya vastuno vedādiśāstraikasamadhigamyatvena śaivādyāgamānumānāgocaratvānna tairanyeṣāṃ jagatkāraṇatvaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4274: kintu śāstraṃ yasya jagatkāraṇatvamācaṣṭe sa eva tathābhyupagantavya iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4277: yadi śāstraikasamadhigamyatvaṃ sautro hetuḥ siddhaḥ syānna caivam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4279: ityāśaṅkaya sautrahetusiddhaye śaivādyāgamagamyatvaṃ tāvannirācikīrṣustatprāmāṇyasādhakaṃ paropanyastamanumānamapākaroti- iti cediti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4284: tadgaḥ pratyakṣāvagataścāsau vyabhicāraḥ phalavyabhicāraśca so 'syastīti tadgavyabhicārivākyaṃ tena dṛṣṭāntabhūtena śivādīnāṃ jagatkāraṇatvā(vagamahetubhūtā)
GSP33nysu__1u:4287: yadi pratyakṣasaṃvādena dṛṣṭārthānāṃ śivādivākyānāṃ prāmāṇyamanumāya taddṛṣṭāntenādṛṣṭārthānāmapi śivādivākyatvena hetunā prāmāṇyamanumīyate,
GSP33nysu__1u:4288: tarhi dṛṣṭārtheṣveva vākyeṣu yatpratyakṣata eva phalavyabhicāravaddṛśyate tasya,
GSP33nysu__1u:4292: na hi dṛṣṭārthaṃ sarvameva śivavākyaṃ samarthapravṛttijanakam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4295: phalavyabhicārastu kartṛkarmādivaiguṇyanimitta iti cettarhi tadapi vākyamapramāṇameva phalasaṃvāsadastu kākatālīyo vā jagadvayāmohakānāṃ śivādīnāṃ guḍajihvikā vetyastu /
GSP33nysu__1u:4296: prāmāṇye hi sudṛḍhanirūḍhe vyabhicārasya kartrādivaiguṇyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4300: kiñca yaḥ śivāgamasyādṛṣṭārthasyāpyevaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ manyate sa hiraṇyagarbhādyāgamānāmapi prāmāṇyamaṅgīkaroti na vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:4305: atha tadanumānamaprayojakaṃ hiraṇyagarbhavākyatve 'pyāgantukena vipralambhādīnāṃ doṣeṇaikasyāprāmāṇyasambhavāditi cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:4323: īśvare jagatkāraṇe pṛthak svatantrānumā ca na mānamityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4325: yattāvatsāmānyato jagatkartṛtvasiddhāvanumānam tatra kiṃ kāraṇādisākṣātkāravatkartṛpūrvakatvaṃ sādhyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4332: kathañcidasya hetuviśeṣaṇatve sādhanavaikalyaṃ ca dṛṣṭāntasya syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4352: tarhyutpattyanantarameva kiṃ na kuryāditi cet na /
GSP33nysu__1u:4363: kiñca yasya kāryatvamātre('pi) vipratipattiḥ sa kathaṃ kāraṇavattāmevābhyupeyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4366: anyathā kathaṃ bhūtale ghaṭabhāvābhāvau yugapatsambhavata itrata cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:4368: kathamanyathā (gagane) pakṣiṇo bhāvābhāvau yugapaditi tatrāpi vaktuṃ śakyatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4371: khananādinā yeṣāṃ vibhāgo nodanādinā ca yeṣāṃ saṃyogaste kṣityādīnāmavayavāḥ pratyakṣasiddhā iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:4372: tatkiṃ saṃyogavibhāgisajatīyadravyāntaravattvaṃ sāvayavatvamityuktaṃ bhavati uta tadārabdhatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4389: anayaiva diśā sarvāṇi jagatkāraṇamātrasādhanāni svatantratānumānāni nirasanīyāni(iti) /
GSP33nysu__1u:4391: yacca śivādīnāṃ jagatkāraṇatve pariśeṣānumānaṃ tadapi kiṃ śāstrānusāri kiṃvā kevalam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4395: īśvare śive jagatkartari ca pṛthaganumānaṃ na mānamityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4401: evakāro na dūṣaṇāntarānveṣaṇena vṛthā manaḥ khedanīyaṃ sphuṭadoṣe satīti dyotayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:4403: īśvaravākyatvaṃ kathamatra hetuḥ syādityata āha- puṃstveti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4409: atha pariśeṣato jagatkartṛtvaṃ tasminnanumimānasya tavāpi kutaḥ siddhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4414: nanu jakatkāraṇatvaṃ śivaniṣṭhamanyatrānupapattau satyāṃ kiñcinniṣṭhatayā pramitatvāditi hi pariśeṣānumānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4424: kimato yadyevamiti cet, siddhaḥ sautraheturityāha- śāstrayonitvamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4433: tarko jñāpayituṃ śakto neśitāraṃ kathañcana // MAnuv_1,1.115 //
GSP33nysu__1u:4437: “nendriyāṇi nānumānaṃ vedā hyevainaṃ vedayanti'; ityādivākyataḥ, iti jñāyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4441: yadapi kāryatvādihetoḥ pakṣadharmatābalādanyasmādvānumānadīśvarasya sārvajñādisiddhiriti tadapi pratipakṣaduṣṭatvādayuktamityāha- vanakṛttvādīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4443: kiñcijjñānaṃ hi puṃstvena śakyaṃ sādhayituṃ sukham // MAnuv_1,1.116 //
GSP33nysu__1u:4450: tatkathamucyate īśituḥ kiñcijjñatvaṃ ca puṃstvena sādhayituṃ śakyaṃ hīti tatrāha- sukhamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4452: prasiddhakartṛrahitaṃ vanaṃ sakartṛkaṃ kāryatvādityādinā yo vanādikartā siddhaḥ tenaivākāreṇa taṃ pakṣīkṛtya prayoge na ko 'pi doṣa ityāśayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4456: sa evakṣityādikarteti kathaṃ na sārvajñyamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:4458: nahi kāryatvādihetuḥ kartāramiva tasya sarvatraikatvaṃ gamayituṃ śaknoti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4461: loke hi gajagavayagardabhādīnāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ ca nirmātāro vijātīyā evopalabhyante /
GSP33nysu__1u:4462: naca vanakartā kiñcijjña iti sādhane kimīśvarasyeti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4468: vṛkṣakṛnnākhilaṃ vṛkṣaṃ vetti puṃstvāddhi caitravat // MAnuv_1,1.117ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:4476: nahi yo yatkartā sa sakalaṃ tajjānātīti niyamaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4480: anenaiva nyāyena sarvatra pratipakṣasambhavāt satyasaṅkalpatvāśarīritvanityajñānecchāprayatnatvaduḥkhādirāhityādikamapi nānumānena sādhayituṃ śakyamityāśayavānāha- ityādīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4494: vastutvāt turagaḥ śṛṅgī puṣpavat khaṃ sutairyutā /
GSP33nysu__1u:4495: citriṇī ca rasaḥ ṣaṣṭho rasatvāt sottaro bhavet // MAnuv_1,1.118a-d //
GSP33nysu__1u:4498: ṣaṣṭho raso rasāntaravānityukte prathamādirasena siddhasādhanaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4508: na ca(nu) viṣāṇaṃ nāma mahattve satyudbhūtarūpa(ḥ) śarīrāvayavaviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4521: anumānatvaṃ yadi kāryatvādau varteta tadā tadaviśiṣṭe vastutvādau(api) vartetetyevamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4523: nanu vicāraśāstramārabhya jagatkāraṇe 'numānānavakāśavyutpādanaṃ vyāhatamityāśaṅkāṃ pariharannupasaṃharati- upakramādīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4538: pūvarsūtre jagatkāraṇatvena pratītaṃ sārvajñaṃ brahmaṇo vedakāraṇatvena sphuṭīkriyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:4540: kathaṃ cānantapadārthātmakasya prapañcasya kartṛtvena na sphuṭaṃ tadekadeśavedakāraṇatvena sphuṭībhaviṣyati sārvajñam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4541: atha jagatkāraṇatvaṃ pradhānādivyudāsena brahmaṇyeva sādhayituṃ hetutvenoktaṃ sārvajñaṃ śāstrayonitvena sādhyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:4545: tarhi jagatkāraṇatvameva tena kiṃ na sādhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4547: jagatkāraṇatvena savarjñatvaṃ na siddhayati vedākartṛtvādityāśaṅkayedamuktamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:4550: viyadadhikaraṇādau sāpi nirākariṣyata iti cet na /
GSP33nysu__1u:4553: kiñca vedakartṛtvābhāve(na) sārvajñyaṃ na sambhavatīti śaṅkaiva nirdalā /
GSP33nysu__1u:4556: yo yāvadarthapratipādakasya vākyasya praṇetā sa tato 'pyadhikamarthaṃ jānātyeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:4558: ayaṃ cāśeṣārthapratipādakasya śāstrasya praṇetātaḥ kathaṃ na sarvatra iti cet na /
GSP33nysu__1u:4571: kiñca vede jñānakaraṇatvaśaktirbrahmaṇi ca tatkartṛtvaśaktiriti kiṃ kena saṅgatam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4583: tathāpi śāstrata evānyeṣāṃ harahiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ pradhānādīnāṃ ca jagatkāraṇatvapratīterativyāpakamidaṃ lakṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4586: yadyapi nāmāni sarvāṇītyādiśrutyā śivādināmnāṃ viṣṇau śaktimātramavasīyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4588: yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārtha iti hi nyāyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4600: upakramādaya evānvīyante śaktitātparyagocareṇa sambaddhayante tathā jñāyanta iti yāvat vākyānyetaiḥ ityanvayanāmānaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4606: yatrāpi pratīvyākhyāne na vyabhicaratastatrāpyupakramādyanusandhānapūrvakatvenaiva na tu svataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4612: mukhyārtho bhagavān viṣṇuḥ sarvaśāstrasya nāparaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.119b-d //
GSP33nysu__1u:4617: tasya ca pravicārita ityadhyāhṛtakriyayā sambandho darśitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4618: nanu ca pratītivyākhyānavadupakramādīnāmapi kvacittātparyavyabhicāradarśanātkathaṃ liṅgatvamityāśaṅkānirāsāya samyak pravicārita ityuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4619: upakramādīnāṃ śrutyādīnāṃ ca sannikarṣaviprakarṣābhyāṃ sāvakāśatvādinā ca balābalaviniścayapuraḥsaraṃ virodhe balavatā durbalabādhayā vākyārthavimarśaḥ samyak pravicāraṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4636_0: anvayādupakramādiliṅgasamudāyāt śāstre samyak pravicārite sati sarvaśāstrasya bhagavatyeva
GSP33nysu__1u:4636_2: jagajjanmādikāraṇatvena śāstrayoni na tu harahiraṇyagarbhādaya iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4638: tatra ca śāstraṃ pramāṇīkriyamāṇaṃ vacanavṛttyā sarvameva ca yuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4645: nanu janmādyasya yata iti yacchabdaśravaṇāttadbrahmeti prakṛtam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4650: naca tasya tadityanuktau anvayaḥ pratyetuṃ śakyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4659: saṃśabdena sakalapadānāṃ lakṣaṇayā brahmaprātipadikārthamātraparatvamucyata iti vyākhyānamakhaṇḍārthanirāsena nirastam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4662: tadevaṃ jagajjanmādikāraṇatvena mukhyayā vṛttyā varṇapadavākyātmakāśeṣaśāstrapratipādyaṃ nārāyaṇākhyaṃ brahmaiveti susthaṃ lakṣaṇamiti siddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:4674: “śabdo na yatra purukārakavān'; ityādismṛteśca brahma avācyamavasīyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4679: aupaniṣadatvaṃ (tu) ca lakṣaṇayā vṛttyā sambhavanna vācyatāmapekṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4681: apara āha na sarvaśāstrapratipādyatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sambhavati niścayopāyābhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4684: “anantā vai vedāḥ'; iti śruteranantaṃ hi śāstramavagamyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4688: naca vastuni vikalpaḥ sambhavati iti atrāpi sandehaḥ samāskandati,
GSP33nysu__1u:4689: ityato na sarvaśāstraprāmāṇyājjagajjanmādikāraṇaṃ samastaguṇaparipūrṇaṃ brahma siddhayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:4690: ityevaṃ prāpte avācyatvaśaṅkāṃ tāvannirācaṣṭe sūtrakāraḥ- īkṣaternāśabdamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4695: na cāvivakṣitārthaṃ śabdamātraṃ brahmaṇo vācyatve heturbhavitumarhatīti tadartho 'nenopalakṣyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4697: sambandhaśca na kartṛtvādirūpaḥ śrutyananugamāt vipakṣe bādhakābhā(vācca)vaprasaṅgācca /
GSP33nysu__1u:4700: tasmādīkṣaṇakarmatvameva hetutayā vivakṣitam ityāśayenoktam- īkṣaṇīyatvata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4705: na vidyate vācakaḥ śabdo yasya tadaśabdam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4707: vācyamiti vaktavye nāvācyamiti vacanaṃ“dvau nañau prakṛtamarthaṃ sātiśayaṃ gamayataḥ';
GSP33nysu__1u:4719: vācyamiti tu pratijñāte parapakṣapratiṣedho na kṛtaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4725: īkṣaṇīyatvaṃ ca brahmaṇaḥ“sa etasmājjīvadhanātparātparaṃ puriśayaṃ puruṣamīkṣate'“ātmanyevātmānaṃ paśyet';
GSP33nysu__1u:4740: tathāca prakārāntarābhāve sati yadi brahma vācyamapi na bhavettadekṣaṇīyamapi na bhavediti bādhakaṃ sambhavatyeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:4743: yat yatkārakāviṣayaḥ tat tatkriyāviṣayaḥ yathā kuṭhārādyaviṣayo gaganaṃ na chidāviṣaya iti sāmānyavyāptisambhavācca /
GSP33nysu__1u:4754: hi yasmādanyathā vācyatvābhāve lakṣyatvaṃ kvāpi na dṛṣṭam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4756: kenacicchabdena vācyameva hi tīrādikaṃ kenacillakṣyaṃ dṛṣṭamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4760: tataśca vipakṣe bādhakābhāvādaprayojako 'yaṃ prasaṅgahetuḥ, ityata āha- kiṃ taditi //
GSP33nysu__1u:4764: yadyavācyamapi brahma lakṣyamityaṅgīkriyate, tadā kiṃ taditi jijñāsāpravṛttāvanavasthitiḥ (syāt) /
GSP33nysu__1u:4766: lākṣaṇiko hi śabdo na śrutamātro 'rthāntare dhiyamupajanayati tatrāgṛhītaśaktitvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4770: kiṃ nāmārthāntarasya svarūpato vācyārthasambandhitayā cāvagatau satyām /
GSP33nysu__1u:4771: gaṅgādiśabdena hi svarūpato gaṅgādisambandhitayā cāvagatameva tīrādikaṃ lakṣyaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4776: tato lākṣaṇikaśabde prayukte vācyārthe 'nupapattiṃ paśyato lakṣaṇīye 'rthe kiṃ tadyadanena lakṣyamiti jijñāsāyāṃ śabda eva prayoktavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4777: tenāpi cenna vācyaṃ kintu lakṣyameva tarhi punaḥ kiṃ taditi jijñāsāyā anivṛttatvācchabdāntarameva vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4780: yadi ca kenacicchabdena vācyaṃ syāttadā taduktāvuparatajijñāso lākṣaṇikakāryaṃ pratīyāt /
