GSP33nysu__1u:8673: sa ca viśeṣaḥ parasparaṃ viśeṣiṇā ca yadi bhinnaḥ, tadā śaktivyaktayorapi kiṃ bhedo na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8686: sati nirbādhe pramāṇe, tadviparītavyavahāreṣu ca tadanyathānupapattyā kalpanaiṣā bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:8688: asti tu parameśvarādikriyāyā nityatve tadityāha- kriyādiśceti //
GSP33nysu__1u:8689: ... kriyādiśca svabhāva iti hi śrutiḥ // MAnuv_1,2.7ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:8692: “parāsya śaktirvividhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñānabalakriyā ca'; iti śrutimanenopalakṣayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:8695: jñānaṃ nityaṃ kriyā nityā balaṃ śaktiḥ parātmanaḥ // MAnuv_1,2.7cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:8699: athavā pūrvā śrutiḥ śaktireva kriyetyatra paṭhitā uttarā tu kriyāyā nityatve /
GSP33nysu__1u:8704: anyakriyā kimanityaivetyato vivekaṃ pramāṇāntareṇa darśayati- śaktīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:8712: tataśca jñānakriyādiśaktiḥ yāvatkālabhāvinī tāvatkālabhāvi jñānādikamapītyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:8721: sphoṭādikāryaṃ prati śaktimānapi dahano dehasaṃyogādisahakārivirahāt na tadajījanaditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:8749: na karma pratyakṣam, pratyakṣeṇa gacchati dravye vibhāgasaṃyogātiriktaviśeṣānupalabdheḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8753: kriyāpratīteranumititvaṃ indriyavyāpārasya cānyatropakṣīṇatvaṃ apratyakṣatāyāṃ pramāṇataḥ siddhāyāṃ kalpyate anyathā vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:8764: kiñca vivādapadaṃ rūpam apratyakṣaṃ, rūpatvāt, paramāṇurūpavaditi kiṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8776: kiṃ ca paramāṇukarmāpratyakṣatāyāmapi tadeva prayojakaṃ kiṃ na kalpyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8777: yadi tarhi karma pratyakṣam, ekasyāmapi karmavyaktāvutpannāyāṃ calatītipratyayaḥ syāt, iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:8781: tarhi karmaṇo 'pi tathā kiṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8784: paṭagrahaṇa eva ca indriyavyāpāropayoga ityapi kalpanāprasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8786: api(?) ca saṃyogavibhāgau dvayāśrayāviti parasya matam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8790: athocyeta, na kriyā sthāṇāvanumīyate, kiṃ nāma śyena eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:8791: nipatataḥ śyenasya pūrvadeśavibhāgotpattau utpatataścottaradeśasaṃyogajanane sthāṇukarmaṇaḥ kāraṇatāyogāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8794: sthāṇukarmaṇā hi śyenasya deśāntarasaṃyogavibhāgotpattyanupapattau karmāntarameva tadanuguṇaṃ śyene kalpanīyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8796: yadgataṃ hi kāryamupalabhyate tadgataṃ kāraṇamapītyautsargiko nyāyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8797: śyenakarmaṇaiva kalpitena sarvasyopapattau na sthāṇukarmopayoga iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:8803: kiñca yo yenanāvinābhūtaḥ sa kvacidupalabhyamāno 'nupayogāttaṃ na gamayatītyalaukikam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8804: dvitīye tu kathaṃ na sthāṇau karmānumānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8805: anumitamapi kalpanāgauravabhayādapanīyata iti cet(na) pramāṇasiddhe 'rthe tadbhayābhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8812: iha tu saṃyogavibhāgalakṣaṇena kāryeṇa sthāṇāveva karmaṇyanumite kathaṃ kalpanāgauraveṇa tadapanayanam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8814: anyathāpyupapatterna sthāṇau karmānumānaṃ, na cāyamarthāpattidoṣo nānumānasyeti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8816: atra hi sthāṇau pratītau saṃyogavibhāgāvakāraṇakāveva syātāmiti vā śaṅkanīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8820: tattadavayavagataparityāgenānyagatasya kāraṇatāyāḥ kvāpyanupalabdhatvena nirmūlāyāḥ śaṅkāyā anudayāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8825: kiñca saṃyogādinā kriyānumāne yāvatsattvaṃ calati pratyayaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8836: api cāpratyakṣe vyomni saṃyogavibhāgāvapi apratyakṣāviti patati patatrī gagana iti pratyayo na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8837: viyati vitatālokāvayavini bahuvihagavibhāgasaṃyoganibandhano 'sau pratyaya iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:8841: yadi ca mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalasyeva devadattasyāpi gatiranumeyā syāt tadobhayatrāpi calatipratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8844: api ca kārmakāraṇādeva saṃyogavibhāgotpattyupapattau kiṃ madhye karmakalpanayetyanavakḷptireva karmaṇaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8846: tasya saṃyogaviśeṣādeḥ svāśraye tatsamavete vā kāryārambhakatvasyānyatra niścitatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8854: tarhi tathaiva paratrārambhakatvamapi kuto na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8865: // oṃ guhāṃ praviṣyāvātmānau hi taddarśanāt oṃ //
GSP33nysu__1u:8866: guhāṃ praviṣṭāv ātmānau hi taddarśanāt | BBs_1,2.11 |
GSP33nysu__1u:8867: ṛtaṃ pibantāviti vākyaṃ kiṃ jīveśvarau pratipādayati kiṃvā parameśvarameveti saṃśaye jīveśvarāviti tāvatprāptam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8873: jīveśvarapakṣe tu chatrinyāyenopacāro bhaviṣyatītyevaṃ prāpte paramātmānamekameva pratipādayatīdaṃ vākyaṃ,
GSP33nysu__1u:8876: dvivacanasya tu na spaṣṭaṃ parihāro 'bhihitaḥ, ataḥ tatparihārārthamāha- dvitvaṃ ceti //
GSP33nysu__1u:8883: naca paramātmani svagatabhedo yujyata iti cenna, dvivacanasya bhedābhidhāyitve 'nuśāsanābhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8885: sā ca paramātmanyabhedena ekatvasaṅkhayayā ca viruddhayata iti cet, na /
GSP33nysu__1u:8887: atha dvitvaṃ dravyāntaravidhurasya na yujyate virodhāditi matam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8890: kintu dvitvaṃ caikasya nirbhedasya ekatvādhāramātrasya ca yujyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:8892: kathamityapekṣāyāṃ tatpradaśarnāya viśeṣaṇācceti sūtraṃ prakārāntareṇa vyācaṣṭe- yaḥ seturiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:8914: iti paramātmanyeva samanvayaṃ pratijñātavatā sūtrakāreṇa sa eva vivaraṇavākyaiḥ prapañcanīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8916: bādhake sati nāyaṃ doṣa iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:8943: sūtre bhāvasyaiva pratijñānāt kriyayā anukterityato 'ntaraśabdamubhayārthatayā vyākhyāti- antariti //
GSP33nysu__1u:8953: nanu ca“ya eṣo 'ntari()kṣaṇi puruṣo dṛśyate, eṣa ātmeti hovāca'; ityetadatrodāharaṇavākyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8957: tatkathaṃ śrutāvanuktaṃ ramaṇakartṛtvaṃ sūtrakṛtā pratijñāyata ityata āha- ramaṇaṃ ceti //
GSP33nysu__1u:8960: na kevalaṃ sūtre 'pi tu śrutau ceti dvitīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8962: ādeyam upādeyaṃ sukhaṃ sukhasādhanaṃ ca māti anubhavatīti nirvacanenetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8969: sukhasambandhābhidhānārthaṃ viśiṣṭapadamiti cet na, sukhitvābhidhānādeva ceti kartuṃ śakyatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8972: “prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma'; iti śrutau sukhamātrābhidhānādityato 'nyathā vyācaṣṭe- viśiṣṭeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:8978: yadi hi sukhābhidhānādityeva brūyāt tadā sukhasyānyatrāpi sadbhāvena vyabhicāraḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8984: sukhena śreṣṭho hi tadā syāt yadi tatsukhaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ bhavedityarthād,
GSP33nysu__1u:8986: athavā“kaḍārāḥ karmadhāraye'; iti viśeṣaṇasya paranipātaṃ manyamānena viśiṣṭasukhetyuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8988: svarūpeṇāpi sukhena viśeṣaśaktayā tadvān bhavatīti jñāpayitumiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:8992: uktā ca sukhasya viśiṣṭatā śrutāvityāha- brahmatvaṃ ceti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9003: akṣyādityayoragnireva niyāmakatayātrocyata iti yat pūrvapakṣiṇoktaṃ tannirākartuṃ sūtram- anavasthiterasambhavācca netara iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9006: jīvasyāgnerjīvāntaraniyāmakatve tasyāpi niyāmakāntareṇa bhāvyamityanavasthiteḥ ubhayorjīvatvasāmyena niyamyaniyāmakabhāvāsambhavācca nāgnirakṣyādityasthatayā atrocyata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:9010: tatra yadi parasyānavisthityasambhavau asmākamapi kuto na bhavataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9011: yathā ca nāsmākaṃ, tathā na parasyāpītyataḥ sūtraṃ samyagvyākhyātuṃ pīṭhamāracayati- anyonyeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9024: nanu brahmādīnāṃ niyāmakatvaṃ mānuṣādīnāṃ niyamyatvamityeṣa viśeṣaḥ teṣāṃ svabhāva eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:9027: svamate ca kā nāma parameśvarāpekṣetyata āha- cetanānāmiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9030: cetanānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ mānuṣādīnāṃ ca, yo viśeṣo niyamyaniyāmakatvalakṣaṇaḥ, saḥ teṣāṃ svabhāva eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:9031: “na tadasti vinā yatsyānmayā bhūtaṃ carācaram'; iti vacanāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:9036: yo hīśvareṇa yasya sarvadā niyamyate, sa tasya svabhāva ityucyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:9039: kimato yadyevaṃ svavyāghātena vinā sūtrārtho niṣpanna ityāha- anyonyeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9053: īśvaramaṅgīkṛtyākṣyādityasthatayātrāgnirucyata iti vadataḥ ko doṣa ityata āha- īśvaraścediti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9058: yadīśvaraḥ sarvaniyantābhyupagataḥ syāttadā sa eva prathamāgataḥ sākṣādakṣyādityasthatvenāmṛtatvādipramāṇaiḥ pratītaḥ kasmātparityajante /
GSP33nysu__1u:9063: doṣavatyeva tasmāt sā naiva kāryā kathañcana // MAnuv_1,2.13ef //
GSP33nysu__1u:9076: athavā prativādinaṃ nirīśvaraṃ niścitya sūtrakṛtānavasthityasambhavāvuktāviti pūrvagranthārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9078: yadi sarvaniyanteśvaraḥ prativādinābhyupagataḥ syāt, tadā sa eva prathamāgataḥ kimityapodyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:9080: kiṃ tu nirnimittatvātsā naiva kāryā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:9084: tathā satyunmattavadupekṣaṇīyaḥ syāt kṛtā ca teneyaṃ sarvā kalpanā /
GSP33nysu__1u:9095: tathā satyanavasthiterasambhavācceti dūṣaṇasyālagnakatvaprasaṅgādityataḥ prameyabhedaṃ darśayituṃ etadadhikaraṇanivartanīyāmāśaṅkāmāha- ramaṇamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9110: iti cet sarvaniyamo yasya kasmānna śakyate // MAnuv_1,2.14cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:9115: etāmāśaṅkāṃ parihartuṃ sarvāntaryāmitvamiha hetutayocyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9117: yat ādityādiniyāmakasya cittavikṣepasambhavena ramaṇaṃ na yujyata ityukte, sarvaniyāmakatvamuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9124: tadevātmano devadattasya pratīpaṃ cittavikṣepakaṃ bhavediti hi dṛṣṭam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9127: athavā yadīdaṃ yastu viśvaṃ svātmaneśvareṇāniyataṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:9128: tadadhīnasattādikaṃ na syāt, tadaiva hyātmanaḥ parameśvarasya pratīpaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:9130: na rājādivanniyāmakatvamātramantaryāmitvam, api tarhi sattādipradatvamityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:9144: annamayādirūpāṇi pucchādyavayavāśca yadyabhedino 'ṅgīkṛtāḥ tadā tathā syurvā /
GSP33nysu__1u:9147: adṛśyatvādīnāṃ tu dharmāṇāṃ brahmaṇābhedo na yujyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:9151: nābhāvo bhāva iti ca viśeṣaḥ prāyaśo bhavet // MAnuv_1,2.17ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:9161: tathā cābhāvo anyonyābhāva iti bhāva iti caitayorloke 'pi viśeṣo bhedo na bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:9164: athavābhāva iti caturvidhe 'pyabhāve prāpte 'nyonyābhāvaparigrahaṇārthaṃ prāyaśa ityukta(tyabhihita)m /
GSP33nysu__1u:9165: anyonyābhāvo hi prāgabhāvādibhyo('pi) bahutaraḥ prativastu niyatatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:9168: nanu prāgabhāvapradhvaṃsābhāvātyantābhāvabhinnaḥ saṃsargābhāvaḥ, kiṃ dharmiṇo bhinna utābhinnaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9172: naca brahmaṇi nāsau śruta iti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9174: na vidyate gotrādikaṃ yasya taddhi tathocyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:9181: yatra hi bhūtale ghaṭābhāvastasya khananādinā vināśe 'pi ghaṭābhāvo 'nuvartata eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:9182: dharmitvaṃ ca bhūtalādeḥ prātītikaṃ na vastukṛtam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9183: ata eva bhāvavadabhāvasyāpi tattvāntaratvamabhidhāya bhāvābhāvasvarūpatvāt ityanyonyābhāvasya dharmisvarūpatāmāha /
GSP33nysu__1u:9195: gotrādyabhāvavattā tu bhāvarūpaiva iti na tasyā brahmasvarūpatve kācidanupapattiriti neha vicāryate /
GSP33nysu__1u:9201: ādye kathamanyonyābhāvasya dharmiṇā virodha iti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9203: nañaḥ prayogāprayogābhyāmiti cet tatrāha- atadbhāva iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9204: atadbhāvo 'nyatā ceti na viśeṣo 'sti kaścana // MAnuv_1,2.17cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:9208: vidyete ca nañaḥ prayogāprayogau ityato vyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9210: doṣābhāvo guṇa iti prasiddho laukikeṣvapi // MAnuv_1,2.18ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:9217: anaudāryaṃ doṣaḥ, iti guṇābhāvasya doṣatvamapi prasiddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:9221: yituṃ sūtrakṛtāpyayaṃ vyabhicāraḥ sūcita ityāha- adṛśyatvādikāniti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9225: tasmāttadeva sūcayitumadṛśyatvādiguṇaka ityadṛśyatvādīnāṃ nañvācyānāmatathābhūtānāṃ guṇānāṃ caikyamāha sūtrakāraḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9229: nanvevaṃ bhāvābhāvayoraikye bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇo virodhaḥ kvāpi na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:9234: bhāvābhāvavirodho 'pi na tu sarvatra vidyate // MAnuv_1,2.19ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:9238: dvitīye tvāpādakāsiddhiriti bhāvena tatsvarūpamāha- tadabhāvo hīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9239: tadabhāvo hi tadbhāvavirodhī na tato 'paraḥ // MAnuv_1,2.19cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:9246: astu tarhyanyonyābhāvasya dharmisvarūpatve pramāṇābhāva iti dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9250: anyonyābhāvaśca bheda eveti kathaṃ dharmisvarūpatvaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:9260: ato 'nyonyābhāvasya bhedatve 'pi, bhedasya (tu) svarūpatve 'pi, nānyonyābhāvasya dharmisvarūpatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9265: abhāvo 'nyonyābhāvaḥ sa dharmī rūpamātmā yasyāsau tadrūpaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9268: kathaṃ pṛthaktavānyonyābhāvasvarūpabhedānāṃ bhedāṅgīkāre kalpanāgauravādikamityata āha- pṛthaktaveti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9273: bhedaḥ svarūpabhedo ghaṭātpṛthak ghaṭo na bhavati paṭa eveti /
GSP33nysu__1u:9274: pṛthaktavānyonyābhāvasvarūpabhedāḥ sarvairlaukikairvaidikaiśca paryāyeṇaiva krameṇaiva pṛthagvākyatayā vyavahriyante,
GSP33nysu__1u:9278: yathā ghaṭakalaśakumbhavyavahārāṇāṃ paryāyatvāt ekenaiva nimittenopapattau ghaṭatvādyanekanimittakalpane kalpanāgauravam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9279: yathā ca ghaṭādivyavahārān paryāyeṇaiva kurvāṇaistannimittamekatayaiva dṛṣṭamiti,
GSP33nysu__1u:9287: mā bhūdghaṭātpṛthagityuktavā ghaṭo na bhavatīti prayogaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9288: ghaṭo na bhavatītyuktavā ghaṭātpṛthagiti kasmānna bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:9289: pṛthaktave sati anyonyābhāvādikaṃ niyataṃ na tvanyonyābhāve pṛthaktavamiti pareṇaiva vyutpāditatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:9309: anyathā bhinno ghaṭātpaṭo 'rthāntaraṃ ghaṭātpaṭa ityādau pañcamī na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:9311: tathāca pṛthaktavameva cedanyonyābhāvaḥ tadā ghaṭo na bhavati paṭa ityatrāpi pañcamī syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:9329: atha kathañcidapādānatvaṃ tatra vyutpādayiṣyata iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:9331: tathā satyanya ityatrāpi sāmyātsūtravaiyarthyamāpadyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:9336: na viśiṣṭādikaṃ pṛthaktavamiti ca svayameva vyutpāditam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9345: ghaṭaḥ paṭo na bhavatītyatra tu, vākyapratipādyaṃ pṛthaktavamiti pañcamī na bhaviṣyati /
GSP33nysu__1u:9346: pratiyoginirūpyatvānirūpyatvābhyāṃ tu vivekaḥ svarūpabhedavādinā vaktumaśakya iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9358: tatkiṃ kalpanāgauravādikaṃ dūṣaṇameva na bhavati, kiṃvā bhavati dūṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9362: yadā tadadhiko doṣo vidyate ko nu vādinām // MAnuv_1,2.22 //
GSP33nysu__1u:9376: yadi dṛṣṭahānyādikaṃ na dūṣaṇaṃ tadāsiddhayādikamapi kuto dūṣaṇamiti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9384: vikalāṅgaṃ ca sādhanaṃ ceti vyāhatamiti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:9397: yadā dṛṣṭahānyādikamudbhāvyeta tadā tataḥ kimityāśaṅkāyāṃ tadadhikastadunneyo doṣaḥ ko nu vaktavyo vidyate na ko 'pi /
GSP33nysu__1u:9401: kadācid dṛṣṭe 'pi vastuni tadadarśanamityādikaṃ na syāditi,
GSP33nysu__1u:9408: tathāpi dharmadharmyādivyavahāraprasiddhaye vastuno dharmiṇo viśeṣā eva saṅgrāhyāḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9417: guṇakriyādīnāṃ dravyeṇātyantabhedaṃ samavāyaṃ cāṅgīkṛtya vyavahārānupapādayantaḥ śrutīnāmupāsanārthatvaṃ anāgantukārthatvaṃ vā,
GSP33nysu__1u:9420: bhedābhedābhyāṃ vyavahāranirvāhaṃ paśyantaḥ kevarabhedapratiṣedhaṃ ca śrutīnāmarthaṃ bruvāṇā na viśeṣamicchanti /
GSP33nysu__1u:9422: akhaṇḍameva brahmābhyupagamya dharmadharmyādivyavahārāḥ sarve 'pyavidyā'ropanimittā iti manyamānā viśeṣamavajānate /
GSP33nysu__1u:9423: tatra bhedavādinā bhedābhedavādinā ca viśeṣamaṅgīkārayati- yatheti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9428: sthāneṣu svaśāstrapradeśeṣu ekaḥ samavāya iti vastuni bhedābhedāviti ca vyavahartṛbhiryathā te samavāyabhedābhedā viśeṣeṇa viśeṣavantoṅgīkāryāstathā bhāvābhāvasvarūpāśceti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__1u:9432: tatra samavāyasyaikatvaṃ kiṃ tato bhinnamuta tatsvarūpam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9440: tathāca kiṃ brahmaṇi śrutīnāmanyaparatvaṃ prakalpya bhedasamavāyakalpanayā /
GSP33nysu__1u:9443: tathāpi samavāyasyeti ṣaṣṭhayarthasya pṛthagabhāvena tatra viśeṣasyāṅgīkāryatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:9446: ādye kiṃ sa eva, samavāyāntaraṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:9455: na hyavayavāvayavyādīnāṃ sambandho 'sti yata ekaḥ samavāyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9464: kiñca bhedābhedayorapi vastunā parasparaṃ ca bhedābhedāntarābhyupagame 'navasthā /
GSP33nysu__1u:9468: atyantābhede 'pi vastuni bhedābhedāvityādhārādheyabhāvo dvivacanaṃ cānupapannaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:9470: tataśca tannirvāhārthamavaśyamaṅgīkaraṇīye viśeṣe tata eva brahmaṇi sarvasyopapattau kiṃ bhedābhedābhyupagameneti /
GSP33nysu__1u:9480: vyāvṛtte nirviśeṣe tu kiṃ vyāvartyabahutvataḥ // MAnuv_1,2.25b-d //
GSP33nysu__1u:9484: anena pūrvoktārthasmaraṇārthatvādasya na punaruktidoṣa iti sūcitam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9491: nanu brahmātirikte satyajñānānandādau vācakatvaśaktimatāṃ satyādipadānāṃ lakṣyameva brahmābhyupagamyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:9500: tathāpyekena padena lakṣitasyaivānyenāpi lakṣaṇāyāṃ vyathartā na parihartuṃ śakyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:9501: nanu ca lakṣyārthabhedābhāve 'pi brahmaṇyāropitāsatyatvādidharmāṇāṃ vyāvartyānāṃ bahulatvāt tadvayāvartakatvena sārthakyaṃ padānāmityata āha- vyāvṛtta iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9503: tadevaṃ viśeṣasya sarvavādibhiraṅgīkāyartvāttadbalena dharmadharmyādivyavahāropapatteryuktam adṛśyatvādiguṇānāṃ brahmaṇaikyamiti siddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:9519: ata eva padadvayānte nibandhanamiti jñāpayituṃ pādadvayārthaṃ tāvadupasaṃharati- bahuliṅgeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9533: pakṣāntare 'pyagnyādiśabdānāṃ homādhikaraṇatvādiliṅgānāṃ ca śravaṇādityata āha- tānīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9534: tāni liṅgāni te śabdā api tadgā hi sarvaśaḥ // MAnuv_1,2.27cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:9539: anena śabdādibhya iti sūtrasya tātparyamuktaṃ veditavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9548: // iti śrīmatpūrṇapramatibhagavatpādasukṛteranuvyākhyānasya praguṇajayatīrthākhyayatinā kṛtāyāṃ ṭīkāyāṃ viṣamapadavākyārthavivṛtau dvitīyaḥ pādo 'yaṃ prathamaviṣaye paryavasitaḥ //
GSP33nysu__1u:9559: hariḥ sūtrakāraḥ atra pāde liṅgānāṃ nāmnāṃ ca svasminvṛttiṃ vakti /
GSP33nysu__1u:9560: nanu pūrveṇa pādadvayenoktā setyata uktam- punariti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9561: nanu tarhi vaiyarthyamityata uktaṃ tatra harau, anyatra ca tasmāt, prasiddhānāmiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:9568: kintu mukhyataḥ parameśvare anyatra tvamukhyetyuktam- mukhyata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9569: evaṃ satyanyatra lakṣaṇādikameva prāptamityata uktam- viśeṣāditi //
GSP33nysu__1u:9572: ye śabdāḥ lokadṛṣṭayā anyatra śaktimantaḥ teṣāṃ vedavākyeṣvanyaparatve prāpte śaktitātparyābhyāṃ bhagavadekaniṣṭhatvaṃ pādadvayena pratipāditam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9573: atra tūbhayatra śaktimattayā lokaprasiddhānāmanyatra tātparye prāpte,
GSP33nysu__1u:9580: atra“yasmin dyauḥ'; ityadivākyapratipādyaṃ dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ viṣṇureveti pratipādya,
GSP33nysu__1u:9581: pūrvapakṣiṇā śaṅkitānāṃ rudrādīnāṃ nirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtritam oṃ nānumānamatacchabdāt oṃ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9588: iti jñāpakādasāmarthye 'pi kvacitsamāso bhavatīti vā'“arthābhāve yadavyayam';
GSP33nysu__1u:9590: athavā tebhyaḥ śivādibhyo 'nyat atad brahma tasya,
GSP33nysu__1u:9601: athavā anyatrāpi siddhāntasādhakasyaiva pūrvapakṣanirāse 'pi hetutvaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9602: tena na nyūnatādoṣa ityetatpradarśayituṃ siddhāntasādhakasyaiva pūrvapakṣanirāse 'pi vyāpāraṃ darśayitumidaṃ sūtradvayamityanenocyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:9664: nacaikaparimāṇopetamevotkṛṣṭāpekṣayāṇu mahaddīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ cetyucyata ityāśrayaṇena virodhaparihāraḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9671: tatra tāvatprathamapakṣamabhyupetya caśabdasūcitaṃ parihāramāha- ata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9680: bhātaṃupratītamapi vākyaṃ tattvato vyākhyāya harau yojanīyam yojayituṃ śakyamiti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__1u:9681: yato 'mbarāntadhṛtyādinākṣarasya viṣṇutvaṃ niścitamato viruddhavadbhātamapi vākyaṃ tattvato vyākhyāya harau yojayitavyamiti vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:9698: yadi caikaṃ tairyutaṃ kathaṃ tarhi tāni viruddhāni syuḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9704: tānyasthūlādikāni aṇutvamahattvādikāni liṅgāni tasmādbrahmaṇo 'nyatra sahāsantyapi govinde 'virodhenaiva sahaiveti yāvat santīti /
GSP33nysu__1u:9705: na punarvirodhamabhyupetyaikatrāvasthānamucyate yena vyāghātaḥ syāt ityavadhāraṇārthasya caśabdasyātharḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9717: kiñcākāśasya paramāṇusaṃyogaḥ kimākāśaikadeśe vartate, utākāśa eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:9747: tathāca bhāvābhāvayoranyatra sarvatra sahānavasthitaṃ kathaṃ virodho na bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:9749: tasmādanyatra sarvatra sahānavasthitaṃ kathaṃ nāma sahāvatiṣṭhata ityevaṃ praśnamātramavaśiṣyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:9750: tatra vastusvabhāva eva tādṛśa iti parihāraḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9753: evaṃ sati vākyavyavasthā na kvāpyāśrayaṇīyeti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:9758: idānīṃ sthūlatvādinivṛttiparatve 'pi na dāṣa ityevaṃparatayā sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe- anyeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9764: tatsvabhāvabhūtāni yāni sthaulyādīni jaḍāni paratantrāṇi kāryāṇi vināśavantyaṇutvādibhiḥ sahānavasthitāni ca /
GSP33nysu__1u:9768: niḥsvabhāvatvamevārthaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha- sarvadharmeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9771: doṣāḥ śrutāśca netyādyā pramāṇaṃ śrutiratra ca // MAnuv_1,3.6 //
GSP33nysu__1u:9773: atra parameśvarasya sasvabhāvatve na kevalamatra kiṃ nāma pūrvoktāṇutvamahāttvādau cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9780: ataḥparāṇi sūtrāṇi bhāṣya eva spaṣṭārthānīti na tatra vaktavyamasti /
GSP33nysu__1u:9784: punaḥ śabdā liṅgaśabdau vicāryā dvisthitā iha // MAnuv_1,3.7 //
GSP33nysu__1u:9791: siddhāntayuktayo jñeyā dṛśyante tāśca sarvaśaḥ // MAnuv_1,3.10 //
GSP33nysu__1u:9803: ata eva pūrvaṃ dṛśyanta ityuktvātra pradarśitā ityuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9811: upajīvyaṃ pramāṇaṃ yasyāsau tathoktastasya bhāva upajīvyapramāṇatā /
GSP33nysu__1u:9815: viṣayāḥ pūrvapakṣanyāyāḥ siddhāntanyāyāścātra dvādaśaivoktāḥ na ca viṣayādinā vinādhikaraṇaṃ sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:9822: anyathā tatrāpi samanvayasambandhānveṣaṇena śiṣyāṇāṃ vṛthā prayāsaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:9849: antarbhāvalakṣaṇasaṅgatyabhāve 'pi devānāṃ vedavidyādhikāraḥ tadabhāvaḥ śūdrādīnāmatra prasaṅgādeva cintitau /
GSP33nysu__1u:9862: atra devānāṃ vedavidyādhikārākṣepārthaṃ sūtradvayam“madhvādiṣvasambhavādanadhikāraṃ jaiminiḥ'“jyotiṣi bhāvācca'; iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:9883: evamavāntaraphalasya paramaprayojanasya ca padādeḥ prāptatvena vidherasambhavājjaiminivacanācca devānāmanadhikāra iti prāpte tatpratividhānārthaṃ sūtram /
GSP33nysu__1u:9884: oṃ bhāvaṃ tu bādarāyaṇo 'sti hīti oṃ //
GSP33nysu__1u:9885: tatphalāya vidhiḥ siddhe copāsāyā nirākṛtaḥ // MAnuv_1,3.14cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:9889: tatra yatpūrvapakṣiṇodāhṛtaṃ jaiminivacanaṃ tasya parihāro nāsti /
GSP33nysu__1u:9901: nanu kiṃ tadanyaphalaṃ kathaṃ ca sarvajñānāmasiddho 'tharḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9904: sarvadā tena devānāmapi yuktā hyupāsanā // MAnuv_1,3.16 //
GSP33nysu__1u:9909: nanu sarvajñānāṃ sarvaṃ na prakāśata iti vipratiṣiddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:9912: nityaṃ vṛddhikṣayāpetaṃ viṣṇoḥ pūrṇaṃ tu vedanam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9914: anyeṣāṃ kramaśo jñānaṃ mitavastugataṃ sadā // MAnuv_1,3.18ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:9936: jaiminirhi śrutaphalādyatiriktaṃ phalādikaṃ vidyānāmastīti vā manyate nāstīti vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:9938: dvitīye tu kathaṃ na virodha iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:9954: ayaṃ nyāyo 'nyatrāpyanusandheya iti jñāpayitumityādaya itrata jaiminyādyā iti sadbhiriti coktamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:9956: kṛtāyāṃ ṭīkāyāṃ viṣamapadavākyārthavivṛtau tṛtīyaḥ pādo 'yaṃ prathamaviṣaye paryavasitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9963: anyatraiva prasiddhaśabdasamanvayapratipādanaṃ pādārtha iti bhāṣyātpariśeṣādvā siddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:9964: anyatra prasiddhebhyo 'nyatraiva prasiddhānāṃ vivekaśca bhāṣya evopapādita iti nehocyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:9965: oṃ ānumānikamapyekeṣāmiti cenna śarīrarūpakavinyastagṛhīterdarśayati ca oṃ //
GSP33nysu__1u:9966: ānumānikam apy ekeṣām iti cen na śarīra-rūpaka-vinyasta-gṛhīter darśayati ca | BBs_1,4.1 |
GSP33nysu__1u:9970: tatra yaduktaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇā“avyaktaṃ cetparaṃ brahma tadā tasya puruṣādavaratvaṃ prāpnoti /
GSP33nysu__1u:9981: yatra vākye sarveśvaratvavirodhi duḥkhitvādikaṃ pratīyate“jīvā eva tu duḥkhinaḥ',
GSP33nysu__1u:9983: tasya sarvasyāpi samanvayo 'tra pratipādyata ityato duḥkhyādagrahaṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9985: yataḥ svasminnavaratvādyabhāve 'pi tadvatāṃ pradhānādīnāṃ brahmādhīnatvena hetunā duḥkhī,
GSP33nysu__1u:9988: ityādyā api śabdā brahmaṇi vartanta ityaṅgīkṛtam /
GSP33nysu__1u:10007: kiñca“prātipadikāddhātvarthaḥ'; iti ṇyantebhyaḥ pacādyaci vihite sulabhaivāvarādiśabdapravṛttiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:10012: avyaktāditi pañcamyā hi puruṣagataṃ paratvaṃ prati avyaktasyāvadhitvamastītyetāvadeva labhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:10013: naca“tadasyāsti'; ityanena samavāya eva prāpnotīti niyamo 'sti /
GSP33nysu__1u:10015: tataśca yadgataṃ paratvaṃ prati avadhitvaṃ tasyāvaratvamarthādāpadyatām /
GSP33nysu__1u:10016: paragataṃ tu yatsvāmikaṃ tasyāvaratvādikaṃ prati svāmyamevārthādāpadyata iti na kaścidvirodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:10024: ata eva“tadasyāstyasminniti matub'; itītikaraṇo vivikṣitārtho nibaddhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:10025: tasmānna tadadhīnatvahetuto duḥkhyādiśabdānāṃ brahmaṇi pravṛttiḥ ityato 'sti tadadhīnatvanimitto 'pi prayoga ityāha- rājñīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:10028: bhṛtyasamavetasya parājayasya rājādhīnatvena yathā rājñi parājayaḥ parājayanimittakaḥ parājayītiśabdo vartate parājayī bhadrasena iti tathetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:10029: kiñca svāmyasambandhena matubarthāpravṛttau gomāndevadatta ityādikamapi na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:10032: svātantryaṃ tadgatatvaṃ ca śabdavṛtterhi kāraṇam // MAnuv_1,4.2ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:10034: yasmāt pravṛttinimittānāṃ duḥkhādīnāṃ tadgatatvamiva paragateṣu svātantryamapi duḥkhyādiśabdapravṛtteḥ kāraṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:10036: tasmādduḥkhyādiśabdā api uktārthāpattibalāttadadhīnatvahetuto brahmaṇi vartanta iti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:10046: tatra svātantryatadgatatvayormadhye svātantryameva mukhyaṃ śabdapravṛttinimittaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:10049: svātantryamapi śabdapravṛttikāraṇamiti mukhyamiti ca krameṇa pratijñātam /
GSP33nysu__1u:10050: tatkrameṇaivopapipādayiṣuḥ svātantryasya kāraṇatvānabhyupagame bādakamāha- kuta iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:10053: anyathā svātantryasya śabdapravṛttikāraṇatvābhāve, rājñi jayo jayanimittako jayiśabdaḥ kutaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:10055: svadhāmopaviṣye rājñi jayaḥ kutaḥ, na kuto 'pi yataḥ, ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:10056: jayasya rājagatatvābhāvātsvātantryamapi yadi śabdapravṛttinimittaṃ na syāt tadā nimittābhāvādrājñi jayiśabdapravṛttirna syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:10070_0: jayasyānyagatve 'pi bhṛtyagatatve 'pi taṃ jayaṃ prati svātantryābhāsamātreṇa rājñi
GSP33nysu__1u:10070_1: vijayiśabdo yāvatprayujyate tāvajjayādhikaraṇasyāpi bhṛtyasya sambandhitayā na prayujyate
GSP33nysu__1u:10071: svātantryāditi vaktavye svātantryābhāsamātrata iti vacanaṃ kimutānupacaritasvātantrye paramātmanīti kaimutyadyotanārtham /
GSP33nysu__1u:10082: tathāpi“jagadvācitvāt'; iti sūtradiśā śiṣyaireva jñātuṃ śakyata ityasiddhirevoktā /
GSP33nysu__1u:10085: nanu yadi svāsyaṃ pravṛttinimittaṃ syāttadā bhṛtye baddhe mṛte vā,
GSP33nysu__1u:10086: rājā baddho rājā mṛta iti prayogaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:10095: nahi siṃhaśabdasya śārdūle prayogābhāvavat upagorapatye 'pyaupagavaśabdaprayogābhāvo bhavatīti /
GSP33nysu__1u:10105: kāraṇaṃ saṃśayasya syāditi naiva prayujyate // MAnuv_1,4.4 //
GSP33nysu__1u:10107: rājādhīnabhṛtyabandhādikaṃ vivakṣitvā rājñi rājā baddho mṛta ityādivākyaṃ na prayujyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:10115: rājā baddho mṛta iti prayoge hi saṃśayo vyutpannasya syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:10119: naca saṃśayo mā bhūdityevaṃ nivṛttaḥ prayogākāraṇatvaṃ svātantryasya gamayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:10126: anyathā rājā jayītyapi prayogo na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:10135: rājño 'maṅgalābhidhānasya ca rājatatpuruṣāprītihetutvādeva śabdasya prayoganivartanaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:10140: tarhi rājā parājayītyapi na prayoktavyamiti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:10141: bhṛtyadvāraiva rājā vijayate parājayate ceti prasiddhatayā saṃśayānutpādāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:10150: guṇāstu tādṛśā yatra prayujyante 'khilā api // MAnuv_1,4.6ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:10164: naca teṣāṃ prayogo dṛśyata iti sphuṭatvānnoktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:10165: tadevaṃ svātantryasya śabdapravṛttihetutvaṃ mukhyatvaṃ ca siddhamityāha- pūjyeṣviti //
GSP33nysu__1u:10169: yataḥ pūjyeṣu svāmiṣu jayiprabhṛtayaḥ śabdāḥ prayujyante /
GSP33nysu__1u:10171: yataśca pūjyeṣveva viśeṣeṇa prācuryeṇa prayujyante na bhṛtyeṣu /

GSP33nysu__1u:12240: tathāca mūrtāmūrtajagadgatena rūpeṇa brahmasadādiśabdavācyamityataḥ tadanupraviśyeti sambaddhayate /
GSP33nysu__1u:12248: nahi vedādṛte 'nyena brahma niścayena vaktuṃ śakyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:12251: tathāpi niruktamityanena virodhātsamyak kātsnaryena vaktumaśakyatvata ityuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12262: nipūrvasya lī(ṅ)śleṣaṇa ityasya vādhikaraṇe lyuṭi kṛte rūpametat /
GSP33nysu__1u:12267: na vidyate vijñānaṃ sakalaviśeṣāvagāhijīvajñānaṃ yadviṣaya iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12288: abhavaditi vacanādbrahmaṇaḥ sattvādikaṃ sādīti śaṅkānirāsāyoktam- sadeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12291: tarhi kathamabhavaditi prayoga ityata āha- vyaktiriti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12296: nṛṇāmupadeṣyṛpuruṣāpekṣayā sṛṣṭau satyāveva bhavet hi yasmā(dasmā)tkāraṇāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12297: atra ca nityaguṇe 'pi brahmaṇi sadādikamabhavaditiprayogo yujyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:12299_0: tat brahma mūrtāmūrtātmakaṃ viśvaṃ sṛṣṭvā tatprerakatvena nānārūpaistadeva viśvaṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:12299_2: sat athedānīmupadeṣyṝṇāmupadeśyānāṃ ca śaṇīrendriyavattve sati pratītasattvādiguṇamabhavaditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:12302: “so 'yaṃ vihāra iha me tanubhṛtsvabhāvasambhūtaye bhavati bhūtikṛdeva bhūtyāḥ'; iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12308: dvibhāgaṃ brahmeti yannirākṛtaṃ tasyopasaṃhāra eka iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12310: ato na brahmopādānatvaṃ prakṛtyadhikaraṇārtha iti (sambandhaḥ) śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12322: tarhyabhidhyopadeśāccetyatroktaṃ“bahu syāṃ prajāyeya'; iti vākyaṃ dūṣaṇīyamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:12323: asyāpi sacca tyacca'; iti vākyavyākhyānanyāyenaiva vyākhyātatvādityāha- bahu syāmiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12324: bahu syāmiti tasyaiva hyuktamārgeṇa yujyate // MAnuv_1,4.80ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:12331: evaṃ tarhi“sa idaṃ sarvamasṛjata'; ityuttaravākyamasaṅgataṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12353: dṛśyate mandadṛṣṭayaiva sa sarga iti kathyate // MAnuv_1,4.81 //
GSP33nysu__1u:12355: brahma viśvātmanā dṛśyata iti yat, sa sarga iti kathyata ityetāvatpariṇāmavāde 'pi samam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12377: avikṛtamevānyadanyātmanā dṛśyata ityasambhavi ityata uktam- mṛṣeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12381: mandā bhavati dṛṣṭiryayā sā mandadṛṣṭistayā māyayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12394: yad brahma vivartavādinā kathyate, tasya dūṣaṇaṃ kathyata, ityāvṛttyā yojanīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12397: sā mandadṛṣṭistasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ kiṃ tato 'nyagā // MAnuv_1,4.82ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:12399: viśvasya brahmavivartatve nirākartavye mandadṛṣṭayāśrayapraśno 'nupapanna ityata uktam- seti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12402: mandadṛṣṭāvāśrayānirūpaṇādinā nirākṛtāyāṃ sarvamidaṃ nirākṛtaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12407: māyāvādino hi kecit brahmaiva svāvidyayā jagadākāreṇa vivartate svapnādivaditi manyante /
GSP33nysu__1u:12408: bimbasthānīyaṃ brahma māyāśaktimat kāraṇaṃ, jīvāśca pratyekamavidyānubaddhāḥ, ityapare /
GSP33nysu__1u:12411: jīvā eva svāvidyayā pratyekaṃ prapañcākāreṇa brahma vibhrāmyanti,
GSP33nysu__1u:12415: iha jīvagetyanuktvā tato 'nyageti vadatā sa jīvaḥ kiṃ brahmaṇo 'nyo('nanyo vā)
GSP33nysu__1u:12417: tatra dvitīyaḥ prathame praviśatīti taṃ dūṣayati- brahmaṇaścediti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12421: yadi brahmaṇo vi(śva)bhramastadā bhramasya viśeṣājñānapūrvakatvāttadapi brahmaṇo 'ṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12423: yadi ca na brahmaṇi sārvajñyaṃ, tarhi kva tatsyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12429: anyathā śuktijñānavato 'pi tadajñānaṃ na viruddhayateti bhramānucchedaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12438: yadi brahmavyatiriktajīvāśrayā viśvabhrāntiraṅgīkriyate tadā bhrāntyāśrayasya bhrāntikalpitatvāyogāt jīvabrahmaṇoranyatā svābhāvikītyāpannam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12443: nādehayogino dṛṣṭiriti tat kāraṇaṃ svataḥ // MAnuv_1,4.83ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:12448: kintu dehayogarahitasyendriyābhāvātatpadārthadarśanaṃ na sambhavatītyato hetoḥ āropakāraṇamindriyaṃ tadāśrayo dehaśca kalpanāṃ vinaivāstītyaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12449: nahi sukhādivadrajatādivadvāsya prapañcasya sākṣimātrasiddhatvaṃ paro manyate dehendriyāṇāmapyutpattimatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12452: astu brahmavyatiriktānāṃ jīvānāṃ sakāraṇānāṃ tadīyadehendriyāṇāṃ cābhrāntikalpitatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12453: draṣṭṛtvena darśanakaraṇatvena tadāśrayatvena tatkāraṇatvena ca bhrānteḥ pūrvabhāvitvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12454: tadatiriktāstu prapañco 'stu bhrāntikalpita ityata āha- dehina iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12455: dehinaḥ kāraṇayutā dehāśca yadi na bhramāt // MAnuv_1,4.83cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:12469: bhrāntyā brahmaṇo bhinnasya bāhyādhyātmikārthabhrama iti hi manyata ityata āha- bhedo 'pīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12472: na kevalaṃ prapañcaḥ, kintu jīvabrahmaṇorbhedo 'pi yadi bhramajo bhramasiddhaḥ aṅgīkriyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:12486: jīvabrahma(ṇoḥ)bhedo yayā bhrāntyā siddhaḥ, sā tāvadajñānāpekṣā /
GSP33nysu__1u:12514: kiñca syādayamanavasthāparihāraḥ, yadi pūrvapūrvatarādidehāderapi bhrāntisiddhatvaṃ pramitaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12517: nanu kathaṃ nāsti,“neha nānā'; ityādiśrutervidyamānatvāditi etadāha(ityata āha)- bhramatve tviti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12522: neha nānetyādiśrutyā sarvasyāpi viyadādeḥ prapañcasya bhrāntikalpitatvābhidhānāt ityāśaṅkayedamuditam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12528: yadi viyadādikaṃ sarvaṃ bhramasiddhaṃ syāt tadā tadantaḥpātitvādiyaṃ śrutiśca tathā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12529: bhramāropitaṃ viyadādikaṃ sarvaṃ bhramasiddhaṃ syāt tadā tadantaḥpātitvādiyaṃ śrutiśca tathā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12531: bhramaśabdaḥ jñāne arthe ca pareṣāṃ prasiddha iti bhramatva ityuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12532: yadyapyayamarthaḥ prathamasūtre varṇitaḥ tathāpi tatrādhyātmikaḥ prasaṅgaḥ (prapañco)
GSP33nysu__1u:12536: nanu sarvo 'pyayaṃ prapañco bhrāntisiddho 'pi vyāvahāriko bhavatyeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:12538: vyāvahārikatā cāsya syādabādhyatva eva hi // MAnuv_1,4.86ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:12541: syādapyevaṃ yadi prapañcasya vyāvahārikatā tāvat (tava) śakyāṅgīkārā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12543: yato 'sya prapañcasya vyāvahārikatā tu abādhyatva eva syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12555: satyaṃ bādhyaṃ śuktirajatādikam, abhijñādikaṃ vyavahāraviṣaya iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12568: nanu tathāpyasatyasya svāpnakāminīsambhogādeḥ caramadhātuvisargādyarthakriyākāritvadarśanāt vyāptivikalastarka ityata āha- na ceti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12573: tarhi mama matena vyāptibhaṅgo 'stu mayā mṛṣātvenāṅgīkṛtatvāt iti cenna,
GSP33nysu__1u:12575: nanu kathaṃ bādarāyaṇasya na mṛṣā svapna ityata āha- vāsaneti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12578: tasya svapnasyāpi māyāmātramiti vadatā sūtrakāreṇa vāsanājanitatvenāṅgīkṛtatvāt idaṃ jñāyate,
GSP33nysu__1u:12579: yat na tasya svapno mṛṣābhimata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12581: kiñca śrutyanusārī hi sūtrakārasya siddhāntaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12582: śrutyā ca svāpnārthasya kartāraṃ vadantyā satyatvamevābhipretamiti na mṛṣātvaṃ sūtrakṛto 'bhimatamityāha- sa hīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12587: “māyāmātram'; iti sūtrakṛtaiva tanmithyātvasya vakṣyamāṇatvādityato vāha- vāsaneti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12588: na māyāmātrapadena svapnasya mṛṣātvamabhimatam, kintu vāsanājanitatvam, ato na mṛṣetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12590: tasyāgāminaḥ sūtrasya vāsanājanitatvapratipādakatvena asmābhiraṅgīkṛtatvāditi vā yojyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12591: na kevalaṃ vakṣyamāṇopapattivaśāt mṛṣātvaṃ na sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12594: yadvā svāpnārtho na tāvadanādinityaḥ, paścāt adṛṣṭayādivirodhāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12604: nanu kathaṃ tarhi“svapnamāyāsarūpā'; ityādau svapnasya bhrāntitvoktirityata āha- jāgratvamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12617: tathā sarpe samāropitāyāḥ kusumamālāyāḥ santoṣakāritā upalabhyate,
GSP33nysu__1u:12621: “nā bhūdatra sarpaḥ'; itivat“na sarpajñānamabhūt'; iti bādhakānudayāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12628: satyapi sarpādau asati ca jñāne, bhayakampādyanutpatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12629: sati ca (tasmin) tadutpatterjñānakāryameva bhayakampādikaṃ na sarpakāryam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12632: sā ca viṣadravyeṇeva bhayādināpi bhavatīti na bādhyasya(syāpi) sarpāderarthakriyākāritvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12634: nanu kiṃ jñānamātraṃ bhayādijanakaṃ kiṃvā viṣayāvacchinnam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12643: nahi kurūṇāṃ kṣetre vasati, gurūṇāṃ ṭīkāṃ paṭhati ityādau viśeṣaṇasyāpi kārakatvamasti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12659: kiñca vilakṣaṇasamāgrījanmanorjñānayoryathā parokṣatvāparokṣatvarūpo viśeṣaḥ viṣayopādhinā vinābhyupagamyate,
GSP33nysu__1u:12661: api ca sarpajñānasya vilakṣaṇārthakriyā na svagatenātiśayena vinopapadyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:12664: sa cāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ satyasarpajñāne samīcīnayā sāmagṣā jātaḥ,
GSP33nysu__1u:12666: ato viṣayāntarbhāvamantareṇa svagatenaiva viśeṣeṇa sarpādijñānasya bhayādijanakatvānna sarpasya kiñcitkaratvamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12667: tadevaṃ yatrātharkriyā niścitā na tatra mithyātvam,
GSP33nysu__1u:12668: yatra tu mithyātvaṃ na tatrārthakriyeti na tarkamūlavyāpteḥ kvāpi bhaṅgaḥ,
GSP33nysu__1u:12674: nanvarthakriyākāritvaṃ yathā vipakṣānmithyābhūtādvayāvṛttam evaṃ sapakṣādbrahmaṇo 'pi vyāvṛttatvādasādhāraṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12676: tasyāpi prapañcāntarbhāvena vipratipannatvādityata āha- brahma tviti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12677: brahma tvarthakriyākāri parataḥ svata eva vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:12680: tena māyāvādinaiva brahma prapañcādapyatiśayenārthakriyākāryamaṅgīkṛtameva hi janmādisūtre jagatkāraṇatvenoktatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12682: nanu mayāṅgīkriyamāṇaṃ brahmaṇo 'rthakriyākāritvaṃ ca na svābhāvikam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12685: ataḥ kathamāpādakasya sapakṣapraveśa ityata āha- parata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12686: aṅgīkṛtaṃ tāvadarthakriyākāritvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ, tatsvataḥ parato vāstu kimanena prakṛtānupayuktena /
GSP33nysu__1u:12692: brahmaṇo'rthakriyākāritvaṃ parata ityasya nāyamarthaḥ dāruyantrasyeva parādhīnam iti,
GSP33nysu__1u:12694: kintu gagane malinateva niṣkriyā eva brahmaṇi māyāsambandhādarthakriyā(di) avabhāsata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12695: na caivaṃvidhena sapakṣapraveśo bhavatyāpādakasyetyata āha paratastva iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12713: nacaivaṃ brahmaṇo 'rthakriyāyāḥ paratastve pramāṇamasti yadbādhakaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:12716: paratastve ca prāmāṇyasyānavasthāpātena na pramā niścīyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:12717: santi“niṣphalaṃ niṣkriyam'; ityādiśrutayo bādhikā iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:12718: evaṃ śrutibalena parastve 'rthakriyāyāḥ svīkṛte tadabhidhātrī“sa idaṃ sarvamasṛjata';
GSP33nysu__1u:12721: kiñcāviśeṣāt“niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyam'; iti śrutiretacchativirodhātparatastve na prameti kiṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12728: na hi sampratipattiḥ syādatastiṣṭhatu sā pramā // MAnuv_1,4.90 //
GSP33nysu__1u:12742: nahi kālavilambena bādhitārthaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavatīti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12744: tathāpi prapañcamithyātvasādhanāya tadupanyāsaḥ kuto na kāryaḥ ityata āha- na hīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12745: na hi vipratipannena śakyaṃ sādhayituṃ kvacit // MAnuv_1,4.91ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:12753: anyathā bhavatāmapi prapañcamithyātvanirākaraṇe tatsatyatvasādhane ca pramāṇābhāvena kathābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12755: na tāvatsatyaṃ māṃ prati vaktumucitam mayā satyasya sādhakatvānaṅgīkārāt,
GSP33nysu__1u:12756: yatsatyaṃ na tatra kriyā'veśaḥ yatra ca kriyā'veśo na tatsatyamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12757: naca vācyaṃ sākṣiṇaḥ satyasya sādhakatvaṃ tvayāṅgīkṛtamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12765: samyak sampratipannaṃ tanna vivatarmamataṃ bhavet // MAnuv_1,4.91c-f //
GSP33nysu__1u:12769: hiśabdaḥ, sarvaṃ vastu jñātatayājñātatayā vā sākṣicaitanyasya viṣaya evetyāditatprasiddhidyotakaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12775: viśvasya satyatāmapi tenaiva sādhayāma ityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12780: tatkathaṃ kimapyanaṅgīkurvāṇaṃ māṃ prati sākṣiṇaḥ sādhakatvaṃ tvayāṅgīkṛtamityucyata ityata āha- yadīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12792: kiñcidapi nāṅgīkṛtamiti pakṣahāneḥ ātmano 'naṅgīkartṛtāpi nāṅgīkṛteti dvitīya evāṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12797: vastutastu vayaṃ sarvato nivṛttāḥ svataḥ siddhe cidātmani brahmatatve kevale bhāramavalambya caritārthāḥ sukhamāsmahe /
GSP33nysu__1u:12798: ye tu svaparikalpitasādhanadūṣaṇādivyavasthayā vicāramavatārya tattvaṃ nirṇetumicchanti tānprati brūmo na sādhvīyaṃ bhavatāṃ vicāravyavastheti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12805: bhavatkalpitavyavasthaiva vyāhatatvādasādhvī bhavadvayavastheti brūmo na punaratra kimapi pramāṇamaṅgīkurma iti cenna,
GSP33nysu__1u:12808: kiṃ parakīyavyavasthāyā asādhutvasvayamavabuddhaya paraṃ prati bodhyate 'navabuddhayaiva vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:12818: evaṃ viśvasya brahmavivartatvaṃ nirākṛtya tatsa(ttā)tyatāyāṃ pramāṇamāha- viśvamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12839: na kevalamāntarasya sukhādeḥ kintu bāhyasya gaganādeśceti vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:12843: sākṣītyevokte sākṣiṇo 'prāmāṇyāt prāmāṇye vā pramāṇatritvabhaṅgāt na viśvasatyatvaṃ pramitamiti śaṅkā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12847: naca sākṣirā vinā bāhyapratyakṣamātreṇaindriyakāṇāmapi satyatā siddhayatītyataḥ sākṣītyuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12859: pareṣāṃ ca iha bhūtale ghaṭābhāva iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12869: kiñcaivamapi nehāloka itīhālokatryaṇukamiti ca pratyayo duḥsampādaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12871: evaṃ tarhi tathābhūtamākāśādikamevāśritya“iha pakṣī'; ityādipratyayaḥ kuto na samarthanīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12884: śabdo hi śrotreṇa prāpto vā gṛhyate 'prāpto vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:12887: sā hi na tāvacchrotrasya gamanena sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:12896: naca śaṅkhaśravasormadhye śaṅkho vā tadārabdhadravyaṃ vāsti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12903: pratyakṣatvādviśeṣaguṇatvācca'; iti prasaktapratiṣedhe pariśeṣādebhyo 'tiriktaṃ dravyaṃ siddhayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:12917: kiñca śabdo varṇātmā vā pakṣo dhvanirūpo vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:12921: ghaṭādīnāmekendriyagrāhyatvābhāve 'pi ātmanastathātvavad dravyasyaiva sato bāhyaikendriyagrāhyatve 'pi virodhābhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12922: yadi (śabdo) dravyaṃ syāt bāhyendriyagrāhyo na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12937: śrotrasya cakṣuṣa iva gatvāgrāhitve śabde diksaṃśayo na syāditi cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:12959: śabdo na vāyavīyaḥ viśeṣaguṇatve sati tvagindriyāvedyatvādgandhavaditi cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:12961: anyathā pākajarūpādayo 'pi na pārthivāḥ, ghrāṇāvedyatvāt śabdavadi(ti)tyapi syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12972: ātmasamavetasyaiva vīcītaraṅganyāyena mūlapratyabhijñānopapattau vipakṣe bādhakābhāvāc ca /
GSP33nysu__1u:12980: pāde me sukhaṃ śirasi me duḥkhaṃ mano me duḥkhitamiti darśanātsukhādiṣu vyabhicārāt /
